1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.longDescription: If the targeted enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, Kerrigan heals for 10% of her maximum Health.

1.name: Sharpened Blades
1.longDescription: Impaling Blades deals 25% more damage.

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Clean Kill
4.description: Ravage refunds Mana on kill and increases damage
4.longDescription: If Ravage kills the target, it restores 75% of its Mana cost and increases the damage of the next Ravage by 25%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.longDescription: After casting Primal Grasp, deal 36 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Fury of the Swarm
4.longDescription: Kerrigan's Basic Attacks splash for 60% damage around the target.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to deal damage over time
4.longDescription: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 (+4% per level) damage over 10 seconds.

7.name: Blade Torrent
7.longDescription: Increases Impaling Blades' radius by 30%.

7.name: Assimilation Mastery
7.description: Assimilation lasts longer and increases Health and Mana regeneration
7.longDescription: Increases the duration of Assimilation by 100%. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 100%.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Kerrigan's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Persistently damage nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: Summon an Ultralisk to chase a target
10.longDescription: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 100 (+4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.

13.name: Eviscerate
13.longDescription: Increases Ravage's range by 40%.

13.name: Double Strike
13.longDescription: When a Basic Ability damages an enemy, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack hits for 75% bonus damage.

13.name: Queen's Rush
13.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Queen's Rush is also applied for free on Takedowns.

16.name: Aggressive Defense
16.longDescription: Increases base Shield amount gained from Assimilation by 100%.

16.name: Essence for Essence
16.description: Activate to steal Health from the target
16.longDescription: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and gain Assimilation Shields for twice that amount.

16.name: Overdrive
16.description: Activate to empower your Abilities for extra Mana
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% and Mana costs by 40% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Increased Maelstrom size and Shield generation
20.longDescription: Maelstrom size increased by 25% . Amount of Assimilation Shields generated by Maelstrom increased by 100%.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: Ultralisk spawns a new Ultralisk on death
20.longDescription: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance, deal damage
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Assimilation
abilities.description: Gain 10% of damage dealt from Basic Attacks and Abilities as Shields for 6 seconds. Shield amount gained doubled against Heroes.Current maximum: 1004 (+4% per level)

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Leap to a target, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage. If the enemy dies within 1.5 seconds, this cooldown is instantly reset.

abilities.name: Impaling Blades
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, deal 261 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 1 second.

abilities.name: Primal Grasp
abilities.description: Pulls enemies within the target area towards you, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage.* Enemies within the target area are pulled a flat distance regardless of the distance between them and Kerrigan.

abilities.name: Summon Ultralisk
abilities.description: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 100 (+4% per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.* Ultralisk is a mobile Summon.* Attack speed:  1.00.* Health: 1369 (+4% per level)* Ultralisks Basic Attacks deal Basic Attack damage.* Summoning Ultralisk while Kerrigan is affected by Spell Power buff/debuff, increases/decreases Ultralisk's Basic Attack damage. Gaining or losing Ability Power after Ultralisk is summoned does not affect it.

abilities.name: Maelstrom
abilities.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.* Maelstrom deals its damage in 14 ticks of 37 damage up to 518 total damage.* Kerrigan can't mount while Maelstrom is active.

1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Image Critical Strikes empower Basic Attacks
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time one of Samuro's Images Critically Strikes a Hero, he gains 0.5 Attack Damage, up to 20. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, he gains an additional 20 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.longDescription: Critical Strike now happens every 3rd Basic Attack and deals an additional 20% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Attacks from Stealth empower Wind Walk
1.longDescription: Quest: Attacking a Hero from Stealth increases the Movement Speed bonus of Wind Walk by 1.25%, up to 25%. Reward: After attacking 20 Heroes, Wind Walk's Unrevealable duration is increased to 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Mirage
4.longDescription: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

4.name: One With The Wind
4.longDescription: While Stealthed, gain 60 Armor, taking 60% reduced damage from all sources.

4.name: Deflection
4.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants 25 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks, reducing their damage by 25%.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes unleash a burst of flame, dealing an additional 65% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes deal an additional 40% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage for each Image that is active.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.longDescription: Critical Strike now has two charges, and Critical Strikes deal an additional 25% of Samuro's Basic Attack damage.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Become an unstoppable whirlwind of death
10.longDescription: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Images can be controlled
10.longDescription: Switch places with the target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the target Mirror Image.  Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of Samuro's damage.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 1 second.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.longDescription: Wind Walk creates an Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports a short distance
13.longDescription: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attack from Stealth to increase damage
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero from Stealth causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro and his Images for 3 seconds.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.longDescription: While Advancing Strikes is active, Basic Attacks increase Samuro's Attack Speed by 15%, up to 60%.

20.name: Dance Of Death
20.description: Images use Bladestorm
20.longDescription: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does.

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Images have increased Health and Duration
20.longDescription: Samuro's Images gain an additional 50% of his Health and last up to 36 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Greatly reduce Wind Walk cooldown
20.longDescription: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

20.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
20.description: Increase Advancing Strikes effect and duration
20.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% bonus Movement Speed, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Advancing Strikes
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase your Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 25% of your damage and have 50% of your current Health. Images last up to 18 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time.Mirror Images are killed by a single attack from Structures.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack within 10 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: You and your Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 25% and you can pass through other units. Damage taken within the first 1 second will not break Wind Walk.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Become an Unstoppable whirlwind of death, dealing 235 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Switch places with the target Mirror Image.Passive: You can control Mirror Images separately or as a group, and they deal an additional 10% of your damage.

1.name: War Paint
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal Sonya for 30% of the damage dealt.

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Periodically gain Physical Armor

1.name: Shot of Fury
1.description: Increases maximum Fury and can instantly gain more Fury
1.longDescription: Increases maximum Fury by 50. Sonya's Trait can be activated to gain 50 Fury.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
4.longDescription: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.longDescription: Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 75% of primary target damage.

4.name: Hurricane
4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Whirlwind by 1 second and Whirlwind removes all slows and roots on Sonya.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.longDescription: Ancient Spear deals an additional 150% damage over 6 seconds.

7.name: Composite Spear
7.description: Increases Ancient Spear range and Fury generation
7.longDescription: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30% and increases Fury generated by 20.

7.name: Follow Through
7.longDescription: Abilities increase Basic Attack damage

7.name: Ferocious Healing
7.longDescription: Consume 20 Fury to heal 10% of Sonya's maximum Health.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

10.name: Leap
10.description: Jump to a location, deal damage, and stun enemies
10.longDescription: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage and reduce disable duration
10.longDescription: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Life Funnel
13.longDescription: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35%, tripled versus Heroes.

13.name: Aftershock
13.description: Using Seismic Slam temporarily reduces its Fury cost
13.longDescription: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Reduces Ancient Spear cooldown and always pulls
13.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 3 seconds. Sonya is pulled to the target location even if an enemy isn't hit.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Periodically gain temporary Spell Armor

16.name: Furious Blow
16.description: Increases Seismic Slam damage and cost
16.longDescription: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 50%, but costs 40 Fury.

16.name: No Escape
16.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap creates a crater and has reduced cooldown
20.longDescription: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Anger Management
20.description: Increases Wrath Fury generation
20.longDescription: Increases all Fury generated during Wrath of the Berserker by 100%.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

20.name: Ignore Pain
20.description: Activate to gain massive Armor
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

abilities.name: Fury
abilities.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancient Spear
abilities.description: Throw out a spear that pulls you to the first enemy hit, dealing 173 (+4% per level) damage and briefly stunning them. If this hits an enemy, generate 40 Fury.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Deals 176 (+4% per level) damage to the target enemy, and 44 (+4% per level) to enemies behind the target.

abilities.name: Whirlwind
abilities.description: Deals 441 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heals for 25% of damage dealt. Healing tripled versus Heroes.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Wrath of the Berserker
abilities.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of stuns, slows, and roots against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

1.name: Boneslicer
1.longDescription: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.longDescription: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 10%. While he is below 50% Health, he gains 20% Spell Power.

1.name: Headhunter
1.longDescription: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%. Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Troll's Blood
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
4.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows
4.longDescription: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.name: Amani Rage
4.description: Activate to lose Health and restore it over time
4.longDescription: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 6 seconds. Zul'jin gains 10 Armor while regenerating health from Amani Rage.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.longDescription: Increase Grievous Throw's damage bonus by 35%.

7.name: Arcanite Axes
7.longDescription: Reduce Twin Cleave's cooldown by 2 seconds. Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: Become unkillable
10.longDescription: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Deal heavy area damage
10.longDescription: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate
13.longDescription: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 15%.

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net that Roots enemies
13.longDescription: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.longDescription: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: Bonus Twin Cleave damage at apex
16.longDescription: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage and count as 0 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.longDescription: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Taz'dingo duration increased, restores Health
20.longDescription: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: Guillotine keeps traveling forward
20.longDescription: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration cannot be interrupted
20.longDescription: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.❢  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1.❢ Reward: After attacking 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.Template:Rewardonly

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

abilities.name: Twin Cleave
abilities.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 116 damage and slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.

abilities.name: Taz'dingo
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

abilities.name: Guillotine
abilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 350 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.This cannot be interrupted, once cast.* Damage multiplier (in %) can be calculated using formula y = x2/50 + 100 where x stands for % health missing (up to 300%).

1.name: Consume Vitality
1.longDescription: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

1.name: Fealty Unto Death
1.description: Gain Health and Mana when Minions die
1.longDescription: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1% (+4% per level) of his maximum Health and 5 Mana.

1.name: Ossein Renewal
1.longDescription: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

4.name: Ghastly Reach
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

4.name: Paralyzing Rage
4.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

4.name: Kneel, Peasants!
4.description: Increase Skeletal Swing damage to non-Heroes
4.longDescription: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

7.name: Willing Vessel
7.longDescription: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Drain Momentum
7.longDescription: Drain Hope no longer Slows Leoric. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Hopelessness
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

10.name: Entomb
10.description: Wall in an area
10.longDescription: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

10.name: March of the Black King
10.description: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
10.longDescription: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Unyielding Despair
13.longDescription: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

13.name: Hardened Bones
13.longDescription: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ominous Wraith
13.longDescription: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

16.name: Crushing Hope
16.description: Full duration Drain Hope deals bonus damage
16.longDescription: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Empower Skeletal Swing and Wraith Walk
16.longDescription: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.name: Mithril Mace
16.description: Empower Wrath Of The Bone King
16.longDescription: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.name: Buried Alive
20.description: Entomb damages and Silences
20.longDescription: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.name: Death March
20.description: March of the Black King applies Drain Hope
20.longDescription: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Spectral Leech
20.description: Basic Attacks deal extra damage and heal
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal damage to nearby enemies
20.longDescription: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected
20.longDescription: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead. Wrath Of The Bone King: Leoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.

abilities.name: Ghastly Swing
abilities.description: Slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.description: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!

abilities.name: Drain Essence
abilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric is Slowed by 20% while this is active.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: March of the Black King
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 12% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: Extra TNT
1.longDescription: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

1.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
1.longDescription: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

1.name: Break it Down!
1.longDescription: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown four times as fast for 3 seconds.

1.name: Goblin Repairs
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25. Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

4.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
4.description: Basic Attacks increase Rock-It! Turret duration
4.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds. Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

4.name: ARK Reaktor
4.description: Reduces Xplodium Charge cooldown, can give turret charges
4.longDescription: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

4.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
4.longDescription: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

4.name: Hired Goons
4.description: Empower nearby Mercenaries. Turrets gain Merc Armor
4.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
7.longDescription: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

7.name: Engine Gunk
7.longDescription: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Hyperfocus Coils
7.longDescription: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Increase Attack Damage, Armor, Move Speed
10.longDescription: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: Pulls and damages enemies
10.longDescription: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
13.longDescription: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 50% and freezes non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.name: Goblin Fusion
13.longDescription: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

13.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
13.description: Xplodium Charge casts when Stunned, Rooted
13.longDescription: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

16.name: Turret Storage
16.longDescription: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

16.name: Superior Schematics
16.longDescription: Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets have 25% increased range while he is within their attack range.

16.name: Kwik Release Charge
16.longDescription: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Gain Armor, Basic Attack damage
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100% damage.  Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius and damage
20.longDescription: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

20.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
20.description: Rock-It! Turrets fire Deth Lazorz
20.longDescription: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Activate to create Scrap
20.longDescription: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Salvager
abilities.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes your Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds. Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

abilities.name: Rock-It! Turret
abilities.description: Creates a turret that deals 62 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

abilities.name: Focus Turrets!
abilities.description: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

abilities.name: Deth Lazor
abilities.description: Charged attack that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds. Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Robo-Goblin
abilities.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

abilities.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
abilities.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: We Move Together
1.longDescription: Increase the base Movement Speed bonus of Crossfade's Speed Boost to 20%.

1.name: Maximum Tempo
1.description: Hero kills increase Amp It Up speed
1.longDescription: Quest: Kill 5 enemy Heroes while Crossfade's Speed Boost is active. Reward: Permanently increase the Amp It Up bonus for Crossfade's Speed Boost to 60%.

1.name: Accelerando
1.description: Wall Ride gradually increases Move Speed
1.longDescription: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.

1.name: Slip
1.description: Nearby enemy Heroes increase Wall Ride speed
1.longDescription: Passing through or near an enemy Hero during Wall Ride's effect increases its Movement Speed bonus to 70% for 1 second.

4.name: Subwoofer
4.longDescription: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 50% farther.

4.name: Off the Wall
4.description: Soundwave's cooldown reduced during Wall Ride
4.longDescription: If Soundwave is cast while having Wall Ride's speed bonus, the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

4.name: Chase the Bass
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 enemy Heroes with Soundwave. Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

7.name: Party Mix
7.description: Playing Crossfade for Allies increases range
7.longDescription: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby Allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple Allies provide additional time. Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

7.name: Sonic Amplifier
7.description: Amp It Up increases Crossfade radius
7.longDescription: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's radius is increased by 50% for the duration.

7.name: Boombox
7.description: Drop a boombox that plays Crossfade
7.longDescription: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

10.name: Sound Barrier
10.description: Shield nearby allies
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby Allied Heroes gain a 1392 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

10.name: Reverse Amp
10.description: Cause Crossfade to damage, slow enemies
10.longDescription:
Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost to slow for 45%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents. 
Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

13.name: Beat Mixing
13.description: Gain a Shield after switching Crossfade tracks
13.longDescription: After switching Crossfade tracks, if the next song plays for at least 1.5 seconds, Lúcio gains a 100 (+4% per level) point Shield that lasts indefinitely.  Switching tracks again removes the Shield.

13.name: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
13.description: Immune to Slow and Root effects during Wall Ride
13.longDescription: While Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, Lúcio is immune to all enemy Slow and Root effects.

13.name: Hard Style
13.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor while Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus is active, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Back in the Mix
13.description: Heal self on Stun, Silence, or Time Stop
13.longDescription: Heal for 260 (+4% per level) upon entering a Stun, Silence, or Time Stop effect. This cannot happen more than once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Rejuvenescência
16.description: Healing Boost also heals a percentage of life
16.longDescription: Healing Boost also heals a percentage of life

16.name: Bring it Together
16.longDescription: If at least 2 Allied Heroes are nearby when Amp It Up is cast, Crossfade's Healing Boost is increased by 45% for the duration.

16.name: Up the Frequency
16.description: Basic Attacks lower Amp It Up's cooldown
16.longDescription: Amp It Up's mana cost is reduced from 100 to 80 and dealing Basic Attack damage to enemy Heroes also reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.45 seconds.

20.name: Bossa Nova
20.description: Reduce Sound Barrier's cooldown, duration
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the shield now decays over 4 seconds.

20.name: Nonstop Remix
20.description: Reverse Amp lasts forever near multiple enemies
20.longDescription: While Reverse Amp is affecting at least 2 enemy Heroes, its duration lasts indefinitely.

20.name: Bonus Track
20.description: Using Crossfade refreshes Amp It Up
20.longDescription: Swapping Crossfade tracks while Amp It Up is active will set Amp It Up back to its max duration.  Can only happen once per cast.

20.name: Synaesthesia Auditiva
20.description: Casting Amp It Up removes Stuns, Slows, and Roots
20.longDescription: The initial cast of Amp It Up removes all Stun, Slow, and Root effects from Allies, and also removes Slow and Root effects on Lúcio.

abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: When moving alongside impassable terrain, Lucio can walk through other units, and his Movement Speed is increased by 20%. This works together with other Movement Speed bonuses.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Deal 112 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area and knock them back.

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Play one of two tracks that passively provide allied Heroes with either a Speed Boost or a Healing Boost in a large radius around you. Activate Crossfade to swap tracks.Healing Boost: Passively heal Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes for 16 health per second.Speed Boost: Increase the Movement Speed of Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes by 15%.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Raise Lucio's Crossfade track volume for 3 seconds, amping Healing Boost  to 124 (+4% per level) health per second and Speed Boost to 45% increased Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Sound Barrier
abilities.description: After a 1 second delay, grant yourself and all nearby allied Heroes a 1392 (+4% per level) point shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Reverse Amp
abilities.description: Blast Lúcio's Crossfade track at enemy Heroes for 4 seconds, causing Healing Boost to inflict damage every second, and Speed Boost to Slow Movement Speed by 45%.Passive: Increase Amp It Up's duration to 4 seconds.

1.name: Pulse Strike
1.description: Increases Melee Pulse Bomb charge rate
1.longDescription: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

1.name: Slipstream
1.longDescription: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

4.name: Parting Gift
4.longDescription: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Increases Regen Globe and Healing Fountain healing
4.longDescription: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

4.name: Untouchable
4.longDescription: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

7.name: Jumper
7.longDescription: Increases Blink's charges by 1.

7.name: Bullet Time
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.1 seconds.

7.name: Spatial Echo
7.longDescription: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb area and adds slow
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb single target damage
10.longDescription: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 10% of the primary target's maximum Health.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb range and charge rate
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Bullet Spray
13.description: Melee hits all enemies in range
13.longDescription: Increases Melee's radius by 40%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

13.name: Ricochet
13.description: Basic Attacks can bounce to a nearby enemy
13.longDescription: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

13.name: Leeching Rounds
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

16.name: Sleight of Hand
16.longDescription: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

16.name: Focus Fire
16.description: Unloading a magazine on an enemy does bonus damage
16.longDescription: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 94 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

16.name: Locked and Loaded
16.description: Time Reload perfectly to gain Basic Attack damage
16.longDescription: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Reduces Melee cooldown and knocks away
20.longDescription: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall can restore Health, but has increased cooldown
20.longDescription: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: Hitting Heroes with Pulse Bomb leaves a second
20.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: You can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times you need to reload over 0.75 seconds. You can manually reload early by activating Reload.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Dash towards an area. Stores 3 charges.

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 557 (265 + 4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when damaging an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Return to the position you were at 3 seconds ago, refill your ammo, and remove all negative status effects from yourself.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to enemy units if you hit them. The bomb explodes after 1.5 seconds dealing 1226 (444 + 5.5% per level) damage to them and 613 (222 + 5.5% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.

1.name: Widowmakers
1.longDescription: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

1.name: Pandemic
1.longDescription: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

1.name: Thing of the Deep
1.description: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Abilities
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

4.name: Hexed Crawlers
4.description: Corpse Spiders restore Health and Mana
4.longDescription: Corpse spiders restore 0.75% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

4.name: Big Voodoo
4.longDescription: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.name: Blood Ritual
4.description: Voodoo Ritual restores Health and Mana
4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
7.description: More Corpse Spiders against single enemy
7.longDescription: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

7.name: Dead Rush
7.description: Zombie Wall deals more damage and uproots
7.longDescription: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Toads of Hugeness
7.description: Toads become more powerful with each hop
7.longDescription: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 20% after each hop, up to a maximum of 80%.

10.name: Gargantuan
10.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area
10.longDescription: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 150 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.name: Ravenous Spirit
10.description: Channel a damaging, movable spirit
10.longDescription: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 207 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Guardian Toads
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Superstition
13.description: Gain Spell Armor while not being Attacked
13.longDescription: Gain 40 Spell Armor, taking 40% less damage from Abilities. Basic Attacks from enemy Heroes remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.longDescription: Activate to become Invulnerable

16.name: Spider Colony
16.description: Corpse Spiders reduce other Basic Ability cooldowns
16.longDescription: Every time a Spider attacks an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Wall of Zombies and Plague of Toads by .25 seconds.

16.name: Ring of Poison
16.longDescription: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.name: Soul Harvest
16.description: Activate to increase Health and Spell Power
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 5% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 25%. Lasts 15 seconds.

20.name: Humongoid
20.description: Reduce Gargantuan cooldown and mana cost
20.longDescription: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.name: Annihilating Spirit
20.description: Increase range and speed of Ravenous Spirit
20.longDescription: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Basic Attacks chain to non-Heroes
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

20.name: Vile Infection
20.description: Empower Voodoo Ritual
20.longDescription: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual. Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased by 200%.

abilities.name: Voodoo Ritual
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks and Abilities poison Non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 145 (69 + 0% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds. If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, you permanently gain 4 Health and 1 Mana.

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 110 (52 + 4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 77 (37 + 4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Zombie Wall
abilities.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 62 (30 + 4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Plague of Toads
abilities.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 140 (+ 4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Holds 2 charges.

abilities.name: Gargantuan Stomp
abilities.description: Order your Gargantuan to stomp, dealing 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Gargantuan
abilities.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 104 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 156 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ravenous Spirit
abilities.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 412 (196 + 4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

1.name: Invigoration
1.longDescription: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Periodically gain Physical Armor

1.name: Chop Meat
1.longDescription: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions and Mercenaries.

4.name: Flail Axe
4.longDescription: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

4.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
4.description: Reduces Ruthless Onslaught cooldown on impact
4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

4.name: Cheap Shot
4.description: Increase Hamstring damage to disabled targets
4.longDescription: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

7.name: Insatiable Blade
7.description: Increases Move Speed while enemies are branded
7.longDescription: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

7.name: Victuals
7.longDescription: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

7.name: Meat Shield
7.longDescription: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

10.name: Furnace Blast
10.description: Deal damage around The Butcher after a delay
10.longDescription: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
10.description: Chain an enemy Hero to a post
10.longDescription: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

13.name: Cleaver
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

13.name: Savage Charge
13.longDescription: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Brutal Strike
13.longDescription: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

16.name: Crippling Slam
16.description: Hamstring slow no longer fades and lasts longer
16.longDescription: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

16.name: Enraged
16.description: Gain Attack Speed and Armor at low Health
16.longDescription: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 15 Armor, reducing damage taken by 15%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

16.name: Blood Frenzy
16.description: Basic Attacks grant Attack and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

20.name: Fires of Hell
20.description: Furnace Blast explodes twice
20.longDescription: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

20.name: Slaughterhouse
20.description: Lamb to the Slaughter chains all enemy Heroes
20.longDescription: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Passive:❢  Quest: Nearby Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and Heroes drop 5 Fresh Meat when they die. You can pick up Fresh Meat to gain 1 Basic Attack damage per Meat. Can hold up to 125 Meat. You drop up to 10 Fresh Meat upon dying.❢ Reward: After acquiring 125 pieces of Fresh Meat, gain and additional 100 Basic Attack damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. You also no longer lose Fresh Meat on death.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 242 (115 + 4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.  Your next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 82 (39 + 4% per level) damage to an enemy and cause your Basic Attacks against them to heal you for 75% of the damage done for 5 seconds. Healing doubled versus Heroes. Last 4 seconds. Your Basic Attacks against a branded Hero increase the duration by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If you reach the target, they are stunned for 1 second and take 261 (124 + 4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around you dealing 1096 (520 + 4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 375 (178 + 4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

1.name: Overflowing Quiver
1.description: Shoot a free Withering Fire on Minion kills
1.longDescription: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, a free Withering Fire is shot. This cannot hit Heroes.

1.name: Dreadful Wake
1.description: Haunting Wave stuns Minions and Mercs longer
1.longDescription: Haunting Wave's application of Black Arrow on Minions and Mercenaries increases the duration to 7 seconds. Haunting Wave restores 5 Mana per Minion or Mercenary hit.

1.name: Mercenary Queen
1.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage.

4.name: Withering Barrage
4.description: Withering Fire gains an additional charge and fires faster
4.longDescription: Increase Withering Fire charges by 1. Charges can be fired 33% faster.

4.name: With the Wind
4.longDescription: Increases Withering Fire's range by 25%.

4.name: Lost Soul
4.description: Reduces Shadow Dagger cooldown on Heroes
4.longDescription: Reduce Shadow Dagger's cooldown by 1.25 seconds each time it spreads to a Hero.

7.name: Barbed Shot
7.description: Withering Fire deals triple damage to non-Heroic units.
7.longDescription: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: Unstable Poison
7.description: Black Arrows explodes Minions on death
7.longDescription: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 116 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

7.name: Possession
7.longDescription: Convert enemy Minions

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Fire arrow that damages and silences
10.longDescription: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

10.name: Mind Control
10.description: Briefly control an enemy Hero
10.longDescription: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Life Drain
13.longDescription: Shadow Dagger heals Sylvanas for 37 (+4% per level) each time it spreads to an enemy.

13.name: Windrunner
13.description: Haunting Wave recharges Withering Fire and is usable twice
13.longDescription: Teleporting with Haunting Wave fully recharges Withering Fire. Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting.

13.name: Will of the Forsaken
13.description: Activate to gain Unstoppable and Move Speed
13.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Periodically gain temporary Spell Armor

16.name: Evasive Fire
16.longDescription: When an enemy is hit with Withering Fire, gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

16.name: Cold Embrace
16.longDescription: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

16.name: Overwhelming Affliction
16.longDescription: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 6% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

16.name: Remorseless
16.longDescription: After using an Ability, Sylvanas's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Increases power of Wailing Arrow center
20.longDescription: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Increase Mind Controlled enemies Move Speed
20.longDescription: Mind Controlled enemies gain 100% Movement Speed for the duration.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Basic Attacks chain to non-Heroes
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks chain to non-Heroes

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance

abilities.name: Black Arrows
abilities.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures for 1 second.

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closest enemy for 48 (+4% per level) damage, preferring Heroes. Stores 5 charges. Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths.

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Deals 37 (+4% per level) damage and an additional 148 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

abilities.name: Wailing Arrow
abilities.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

abilities.name: Mind Control
abilities.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.longDescription: While Stealthed, Nova gains 2 Mana per second and 25% increased movement speed.

1.name: Longshot
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: Stealth enhances Pinning Shot slow and cost
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy cooldown and Mana cost
4.longDescription: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.longDescription: Increases the cast range, sight range, and duration of Holo Decoy by 100%.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Kill Minions or Heroes to bribe a Mercenary
4.longDescription: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: Using an Ability empowers next Basic Attack
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 80% additional damage.

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Basic Attacks hit harder, reduce Physical Armor
7.longDescription: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 10 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

7.name: Snipe Master
7.description: Increases Snipe damage from hitting Heroes
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Fire at a target 3 times
10.longDescription: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+4% per level) damage each.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: Area attack with unlimited range
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.name: Double Tap
13.longDescription: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Removes Snipe Mana cost and increases range
13.longDescription: Removes Snipe's Mana cost and increases its range by 15%.

13.name: Explosive Round
13.description: Snipe deals damage in an area
13.longDescription: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Perfect Shot
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Crippling Shot
16.longDescription: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.longDescription: Holo Decoy deals 40% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap cooldown resets on Hero kills
20.longDescription: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike can hold 2 charges
20.longDescription: Precision Strike holds 2 charges with a 3 second cooldown between using each charge.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset cooldowns

20.name: Ghost Protocol
20.description: Activate to gain Stealth
20.longDescription: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Nova's attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

abilities.name: Permanent Cloak, Sniper
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.Enemies are able to see Stealthed models as distortion in environment.Stealth model is larger while Mounted.All skins share the same Stealthed model.All Mounts share the same Stealthed model.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Deals 310 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and slow it by 30% for 2.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies. Using this Ability does not break Cloak.Decoy is a Heroic Pet.Decoy does not deal damage unless Lethal Decoy has been picked at level 16.Decoy leaves stealth 1 second after being cast and mimics Nova's Basic Abilities in following order: Snipe > AA > Pinning Shot > AA (> Pinning Shot, if Double Tap has been picked.)Decoy mimics stutter-stepping.Decoy has same cooldowns as Nova.Decoy's Pinning Shot doesn't slow.Decoy benefits from all of Nova's non-active Talents unless otherwise stated.Decoy attacks enemies and aggroed Mercenaries in range prioritising Heroes.

abilities.name: Triple Tap
abilities.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+4% per level) damage each.Can only target Heroes.Triple Tap has one second cast period followed by a stationary channel. Nova can't take any actions while channeling.Triple Tap can't be manually cancelled and only ends, if its channeling is interrupted, Nova or the target is killed or removed from the battlefield or once all 3 shots have been fired.The shots are fired at 1 second intervals.The target is Revealed for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Precision Strike
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.Nova gains XP and Covert Mission stacks from enemies killed by Precision Strike regardless of distance.

1.name: Colossal Totem
1.description: Increases Earthbind Totem area and range
1.longDescription: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

1.name: Electric Charge
1.longDescription: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

1.name: Wolf Run
1.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

1.name: Lightning Bond
1.description: Lightning Shield is also cast on Rehgar
1.longDescription: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.

4.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
4.longDescription: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 65 to 45.

4.name: Feral Heart
4.description: Increases Health and Mana Regen in Ghost Wolf
4.longDescription: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

4.name: Stormcaller
4.longDescription: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 40.

4.name: Healing Totem
4.description: Activate to place a ward which heals in an area
4.longDescription: Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

7.name: Blood and Thunder
7.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns
7.longDescription: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.name: Farsight
7.description: Activate to reveal target area and nearby enemies
7.longDescription: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds.  Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

7.name: Totemic Projection
7.longDescription: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

10.name: Ancestral Healing
10.description: Significantly heal allied Hero
10.longDescription: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 (+4% per level) Health.  Cannot be used on Rehgar.

10.name: Bloodlust
10.description: Give allied Heroes Movement Speed, Attack Speed, and Life Steal
10.longDescription: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Earth Shield
13.longDescription: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

13.name: Tidal Waves
13.longDescription: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed.

13.name: Earthliving Enchant
13.description: Empowers Chain Heal on low Health Heroes
13.longDescription: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 200 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
16.longDescription: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Hunger of the Wolf
16.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for of his maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Increases Lightning Shield damage with each hit
16.longDescription: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 10%. Stacks up to 20 times.

20.name: Farseer's Blessing
20.description: Increases heal and heals in area
20.longDescription: Increases healing amount by 50%. Allies near the target are healed for 50% of the amount of health regained.

20.name: Gladiator's War Shout
20.description: Increases Bloodlust Life Steal
20.longDescription: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset cooldowns

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies

abilities.name: Ghost Wolf
abilities.description: Instead of using a mount, you transform into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause you to lunge at your target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

abilities.name: Chain Heal
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 334 (+4% per level) Health, then heal up to two other nearby allies for 167 (+4% per level) Health each.

abilities.name: Lightning Shield
abilities.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies. Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthbind Totem
abilities.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%. The totem has 217 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed, and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Ancestral Healing
abilities.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 (+4% per level) Health. Cannot be used on yourself.

1.name: Sulfuras Hungers
1.description: Kill Minions with Empower Sulfuras to increase its damage
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30. Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

1.name: Shifting Meteor
1.description: Hit Heroes to empower Living Meteor
1.longDescription: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 3% increased damage from it. Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

1.name: Engulfing Flame
1.longDescription: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

4.name: Fire Ward
4.longDescription: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Block, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Slow Burn
4.longDescription: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Catching Fire
4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75. Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
7.longDescription: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Molten Power
7.description: After hitting Heroes, next Living Meteor deals increased damage
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

7.name: Blistering Attacks
7.description: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
7.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

10.name: Sulfuras Smash
10.description: Damage and Stun enemies in an area
10.longDescription: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Lava Wave
10.description: Send a wave of lava down a lane
10.longDescription: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.longDescription: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.longDescription: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras deals extra damage to Heroes
16.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path
16.longDescription: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: A second Blast Wave is created after the first
16.longDescription: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies, stuns longer
20.longDescription: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave has two charges
20.longDescription: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Enhances Molten Core Health, cooldown, damage
20.longDescription: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Activate to heal and enter Stasis
20.longDescription: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 (+4% per level) Health that burns away over 18 seconds. Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.Molten Core has 2 second cast time.You can exit Molten Core after 1 second channel by reactivating Trait. Exiting can be cancelled by pressing Trait button again before channel is complete.Ragnaros loses 222 (+4% per level) Health per second in Molten Core. Ragnaros Unstoppable, immune to friendly Abilities and inable to move while in Molten Core.Some Abilities that were cast before entering Molten Core persist such as Auriel's Bestow Hope.Molten Core Ragnaros cannot be healed, but regular Ragnaros can regenerate health inside Molten Core.Entering Molten Core removes most debuffs from Ragnaros including damage over time effects. Molten Core Ragnaros can not be targeted or affected by Abathur's Ultimate Evolution, Sylvanas' Black Arrow or Zagara's Devouring Maw.

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 (+4% per level) Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.Molten Core: Molten SwingStun and damage nearby enemies.Cooldown starts when the ability is triggered by attacking an enemy.Triggering the ability while Ragnaros is Blinded causes both the Basic Attack and AOE damage to miss completely.

abilities.name: Molten Swing
abilities.description: Swing your hammer in a wide arc, dealing moderate damage and stunning enemies for 1 second.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Living Meteor
abilities.description: Summon a meteor at the target point that deals 68 (+4% per level) damage, then rolls in that target direction dealing 272 (+4% per level) damage per second for 1.75 seconds.Molten Core: Meteor ShowerDrop a line of meteor impacts.Meteor can damage enemies multiple times as it rolls.The meteor deals damage every 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Meteor Shower
abilities.description: Summon 3 meteors at the target point that fall in the target direction. Each meteor deals moderate damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Blast Wave
abilities.description: Ignite Ragnaros or an ally, granting 25% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds before exploding dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.Molten Core: Explosive RuneCause a delayed explosion in a large area.

abilities.name: Explosive Rune
abilities.description: Create a rune that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing damage to non-Structure enemies in a circular area.Damage increased by 25% versus Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Sulfuras Smash
abilities.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.In Molten Core form, the range increases to match that of Meteor Shower and Explosive Rune.

abilities.name: Lava Wave
abilities.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.longDescription: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Increases Twin Blades damage to non-Heroes
1.longDescription: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
1.longDescription: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Psionic Synergy
4.description: Increases Blade Dash cooldown reduction of Shield Overload
4.longDescription: Increases Blade Dash's cooldown reduction of Shield Overload by hitting Heroes by 2 seconds.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload recharges faster while active
4.longDescription: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 50% faster while its shield is active, and the shield duration is increased by 1 second.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increase Shield Overload shield at low Health
4.longDescription: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.longDescription: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

7.name: Warp Sickness
7.longDescription: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 50% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Damage and Blind enemies in a large area
10.longDescription: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Chase an enemy with an orbital beam
10.longDescription: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's Zeal
