13.description: Blade Dash recharges faster when at low Health
13.longDescription: Blade Dash cooldown recharges 150% faster while below 50% Health.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Twin Blades strikes 3 times but increases cooldown
13.longDescription: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Reduces Phase Prism cooldown and pull another Hero
13.longDescription: Phase Prism pulls and damages an additional enemy Hero near the first, and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.longDescription: When Shield Overload activates, gain 40 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

16.name: Zealot Charge
16.longDescription: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Twin Blades deals more damage versus Heroes
16.longDescription: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

16.name: Psionic Wound
16.longDescription: Twin Blades final strike lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Plasma Burn
16.longDescription: While Shield Overload is active, deal 55 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge
20.longDescription: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: Purifier Beam recasts if target dies
20.longDescription: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Force of Will
20.description: Increases Shield Overload Basic Attack reduction
20.longDescription: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

abilities.name: Shield Overload
abilities.description: If you take damage while below 75% Health, gain a 375 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds. Your Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dash
abilities.description: Dash forward and deal 57 (+4% per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 (+4% per level) damage. Every enemy hit reduces the cooldown on Shield Overload by 1 second, and Heroes by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Twin Blades
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack immediately causes you to charge a short distance and strike the enemy 2 times.

abilities.name: Phase Prism
abilities.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 (+4% per level) damage to Heroes and swaps your position with theirs. Can be used during Blade Dash.

abilities.name: Purifier Beam
abilities.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Suppression Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.longDescription: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.longDescription: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Damage to Chilled targets returns Mana
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Chill attackers and gain Physical Armor
4.longDescription: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase Cone of Cold area, reduce cooldown
7.longDescription: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 2.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 seconds per use.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Reduce Frostbolt cooldown on Chilled targets
7.longDescription: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Icefury Wand
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 75% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 1 second.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: Create a ring that damages and Roots enemies
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental that Chills enemies
10.longDescription: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 78 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.longDescription: Increase cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.longDescription: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.longDescription: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 300% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.longDescription: Increase the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets
16.longDescription: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: Ring of Frost center deals damage, Roots
20.longDescription: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increase cast range and mimics Basic Abilities
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport and Chill nearby enemies
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: Chill Slow stacks
20.longDescription: Frostbite's Chill can now stacks a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Jaina's abilities Chill targets, slowing them by 25% and amplifying damage taken from her abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.❢  Quest: Deal 15,000 damage to Chilled enemy Heroes.❢ Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block ability. Activate to place Jaina in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled. 40 second cooldown.* Chill is applied after damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Frostbolt
abilities.description: Deal 190 (+4% per level) damage and Chill the target.* Deals 285 damage against Chilled targets.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Bombard an area with 3 waves of ice, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.* Deals total of 568 damage to non-Chilled targets and 639 damage total to targets that are already Chilled.

abilities.name: Cone of Cold
abilities.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage and Chill targets.* Deals 345 damage against Chilled targets.

abilities.name: Ring of Frost
abilities.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.* Ring of Frosts area of effect is a ring, the ability doesn't hit enemies in the middle area, without lvl 20 upgrade.

abilities.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilities.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental. Lasts 20 seconds.* Water Elemental is a mobile Summon.* Attack speed: 1.00* Health: 958* Summoning Water Elemental while Jaina is affected by Spell Power buff/debuff, increases/decreases all Water Elemental's damage, including Basic Attack damage. Gaining or losing Spell Power after Water Elemental is summoned does not affect it.* Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal Basic Attack damage.

1.name: Volatile Acid
1.description: Increase Baneling range and non-Hero damage
1.longDescription: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

1.name: Corpse Feeders
1.description: Infested Drop cooldown is reduced and Roachlings take less damage
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 40% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

1.name: Infest
1.description: Increases nearby allied Ranged Minion's damage
1.longDescription: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

4.name: Envenomed Spines
4.longDescription: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

4.name: Medusa Blades
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

4.name: Serrated Spines
4.description: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by .
4.longDescription: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

7.name: Baneling Massacre
7.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings.

7.name: Viscous Acid
7.longDescription: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Bile Drop
7.longDescription: Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%. Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

10.name: Devouring Maw
10.description: Eats enemies in area
10.longDescription: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

10.name: Nydus Network
10.description: Empowers Creep and can create Nydus Worms
10.longDescription:
Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time. 
Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.
Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by .75 seconds.

13.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
13.longDescription: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

13.name: Protective Coating
13.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Periodically gain temporary Spell Armor

16.name: Brood Expansion
16.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer
16.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 6 seconds.

16.name: Corrosive Saliva
16.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Mutalisk
16.description: Hunter Killer summons a Mutalisk instead
16.longDescription: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

20.name: Tyrant Maw
20.description: More damage and cooldown reduction from Takedowns
20.longDescription: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage and getting a Takedown reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.name: Endless Creep
20.description: Increases Creep Tumor's cast range and duration
20.longDescription: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Basic Attacks chain to non-Heroes
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks chain to non-Heroes

abilities.name: Creep Tumor
abilities.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds.

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 (+4% per level) splash damage.

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 65 (+3.5% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 147 (+3% per level) damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 29 (+3% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Devouring Maw
abilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 80 (+4% per level) damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

abilities.name: Nydus Network
abilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 9.75% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive:Creep spreads 15% farther.Passive:While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

1.name: Convection
1.longDescription: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death. Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.name: Fel Infusion
1.description: Increases Spell Power, Verdant Spheres heals
1.longDescription: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.name: Mana Addict
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15. Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse range and restores Mana
4.longDescription: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

4.name: Energy Roil
4.description: Reduce Gravity Lapse cooldown on Heroes
4.longDescription: When Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Mana Tap
4.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.longDescription: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bomb deals more damage after spreading
7.longDescription: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
7.description: Special attack on Verdant Spheres activation
7.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next Basic Attack to instead deal 165 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Summon a Phoenix to burn enemies
10.longDescription: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: Blast an enemy with a big fireball
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Living Bomb reduces Basic Ability cooldowns
13.longDescription: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1 second.

13.name: Backdraft
13.longDescription: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.longDescription: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.longDescription: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge
16.longDescription: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

16.name: Arcane Dynamo
16.description: Using Basic Abilities increases Spell Power
16.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 3% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

20.name: Rebirth
20.description: Increases Phoenix duration and may retarget
20.longDescription: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast radius and lowers cooldown
20.longDescription: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50% and reduces its cooldown by 25 seconds per enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.
20.longDescription: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases Flamestrike's range
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 320 (+4% per level) damage in an area.Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.* Living bomb deals 3 ticks of 40 damage before exploding.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyroblast
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.* Cast time is a 1.5 second stationary channel.

abilities.name: Phoenix
abilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.* Phoenix is Untargetable and Invulnerable and has no collision.* Phoenix attacks the nearest enemy to the center, prioritizing Heroes* Phoenix' attacks deal Spell Damage* Phoenix' initial swoop through enemies is affected by Spell Power, but its attacks aren't at any time.* Phoenix attacks 13 times during it's duration, dealing total of 1014 damage and 507 splash damage.

1.name: Death's Reach
1.longDescription: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.

1.name: On a Pale Horse
1.longDescription: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

1.name: Fear the Reaper
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

4.name: Die Alone
4.longDescription: Soul Rip deals 75% more damage if it hits only one Hero and no other enemies.

4.name: Throwing Shade
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Death Shroud. Reward: Permanently increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 4 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 25.

4.name: Black Harvest
4.longDescription: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 150 seconds. Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cold Hand
7.longDescription: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Mortality
7.description: Wraith Strike deals bonus damage to Heroes
7.longDescription: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

7.name: Touch of Death
7.longDescription: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Tormented Souls
10.description: Apply Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Gain 20 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Last Rites
10.description: Damage a Hero based on their missing Health
10.longDescription: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed while under the effect of Last Rites permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

13.name: Soul Siphon
13.longDescription: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Ethereal Existence
13.longDescription: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 40.

13.name: Inevitable End
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable, remove Marks
13.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
13.longDescription: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

16.name: Soul Collector
16.description: Increase Soul Rip range, reduce cooldown
16.longDescription: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 50%.

16.name: Massacre
16.longDescription: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

16.name: Memento Mori
16.description: Reaper's Mark deals increased damage over time
16.longDescription: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Hero Takedowns extend Tormented Souls duration
20.longDescription: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 1 second. While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns extend its duration by 4 seconds.

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: Last Rites heals
20.longDescription: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail
20.longDescription: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: Activate to respawn
20.longDescription: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Altar but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

abilities.name: Reaper's Mark
abilities.description: Basic Attacks afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds. Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health every 1 second.Damage dealt by Reaper's Mark is dealt as Spell Damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 (+4% per level)damage and healing Malthael for 44 (+4% per level) per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.Can only be activated, if there is at least one enemy affected by Reaper's Mark.

abilities.name: Wraith Strike
abilities.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.Can only be activated, if there is at least one enemy affected by Reaper's Mark.Malthael teleports to the opposite side of the target from his location.

abilities.name: Death Shroud
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

abilities.name: Tormented Souls
abilities.description: Gain 10 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Last Rites
abilities.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.❢ Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed while under the effect of Last Rites permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.Enemy heroes damaged enough to be killed by using this ability are indicated by a red skull above them, if the ability is not on cooldown.

1.name: Celestial Alignment
1.longDescription: Empowers Moonfire

1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
1.longDescription: Reduces Innervate's cooldown by 8 seconds.

1.name: Moonburn
1.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's damage to Minions by 75%. Repeatable Quest: Every 5 Minions killed nearby increase this bonus by 1%, up to 25%. After reaching a 25% bonus, Moonburn's bonus damage also applies to Mercenaries and Monsters.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Reveals a large area, can be killed
1.longDescription: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Elune's Grace
4.longDescription: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 25%.

4.name: Full Moonfire
4.description: Increases Moonfire area and reduces Mana cost
4.longDescription: Increases Moonfire's radius by 50% and reduces its Mana cost by 5.

4.name: Vengeful Roots
4.longDescription: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 70 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's damage per second by 8.

7.name: Hindering Moonfire
7.longDescription: Moonfire Slows targets by 25% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Lunar Shower
7.longDescription: Using Moonfire reduces the cooldown of the next Moonfire by 0.5 seconds, and increases the damage by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times and resets after 6 seconds.

7.name: Strangling Vines
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heals nearby allied Heroes over time
10.longDescription: Heals 80 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: Silence and damage nearby enemies
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 374 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Life Seed
13.longDescription: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage
13.longDescription: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: Increase Regrowth heal at high Health
16.longDescription: While above 75% Health, Regrowth's additional healing-over-time is increased by 40%.

16.name: Tenacious Roots
16.description: Increases Entangling Root area and duration
16.longDescription: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and Roots targets for 0.25 seconds longer.

16.name: Revitalize
16.longDescription: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Increases Tranquility healing and grants Mana
20.longDescription: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to teleport and cast Twilight Dream
20.longDescription: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset cooldowns

abilities.name: Innervate
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 20% of their maximum Mana over 5 seconds. While affected by Innervate, their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 150 (+4% per level) Health instantly and an additional 536 (+4% per level) Health over 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonfire
abilities.description: Deal 105 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds, and deals 117 (+4% per level) damage over the duration. Affected area grows over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Tranquility
abilities.description: Heals 80 (+4% per level) Health per second to nearby allied Heroes over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Twilight Dream
abilities.description: After a short delay, deal 374 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

1.name: Bulwark
1.longDescription: Increases the duration of Armor granted by Shadow Charge from 2 seconds to 4 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Souls empower Regen Globes, Healing Fountains
1.longDescription: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2% per Soul.

1.name: Life Leech
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Diablo for the same amount.

4.name: From the Shadows
4.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Shadow Charge by 40%.

4.name: Speed Demon
4.description: Being Stunned, Rooted grants Movement Speed
4.longDescription: Being Stunned or Rooted increases Diablo's Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

4.name: Demonic Strength
4.longDescription: Once Overpower's stun expires, the target is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Soul Feast
7.longDescription: Black Soulstone increases Diablo's Health Regeneration by 0.4 per second per Soul.

7.name: Soul Shield
7.longDescription: Black Soulstone grants Diablo 0.25 Spell Armor per soul, reducing Ability Damage taken by 0.25% per Soul.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Overpower and Shadow Charge by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Stun all enemy Heroes
10.longDescription: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: Channeled spell that damages enemies
10.longDescription: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.longDescription: Shadow Charge's terrain collision against Heroes deals an additional 5% of the target's maximum life. Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase the maximum life damage by 2%, to a maximum of 10% bonus.

13.name: Fire Devil
13.description: Fire Stomp grants a damage aura
13.longDescription: Fire Stomp increases Diablo's Basic Attack damage by 20% and surrounds Diablo in flames that deal 20 (+4% per level) damage every second. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Hellfire
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp increases the damage of the next Fire Stomp by 12%, up to 120%.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are slowed by 15% for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Overpower resets cooldown of Shadow Charge
16.longDescription: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Fearful Presence
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the damage dealt by nearby enemy Heroes by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Diablo have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse triggers on death
20.longDescription: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches longer
20.longDescription: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Steal Health from nearby enemy Heroes
20.longDescription: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and create an Apocalypse
20.longDescription: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone
abilities.description: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

abilities.name: Shadow Charge
abilities.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%. If the enemy collides with terrain, they are stunned for 1 second and take an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Fire Stomp
abilities.description: Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal 54 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range, they return dealing an additional 81 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Apocalypse
abilities.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Breath
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 800 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.

1.name: Caduceus Feedback
1.longDescription: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

1.name: Life Support
1.longDescription: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

1.name: Clear!
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 3 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

4.name: Cellular Reactor
4.longDescription: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

4.name: Trauma Trigger
4.longDescription: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Blast Shield
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

7.name: Physical Therapy
7.longDescription: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target. When a Slow is removed this way, reduce the cooldown of Safeguard by 4 seconds.

7.name: Vanadium Plating
7.longDescription: While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned, Safeguard grants an additional 25 Armor and its duration is paused.

7.name: Prolonged Safeguard
7.longDescription: Increase Safeguard's duration by 50%.

10.name: Stim Drone
10.description: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
10.longDescription: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

10.name: Medivac Dropship
10.description: Transport allies across long distances
10.longDescription: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

13.name: EMP Grenade
13.description: Displacement Grenade deals more damage to Shields
13.longDescription: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 40 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

13.name: System Shock
13.longDescription: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Second Opinion
13.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

16.name: Extended Care
16.longDescription: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 40%.

16.name: First Responder
16.description: Healing Beam empowered at high Energy
16.longDescription: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

16.name: Shield Sequencer
16.longDescription: Safeguard gains a second charge.

20.name: Hyperactivity
20.description: Lower cooldown, increase Movement Speed
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

20.name: Safe Zone
20.description: Exiting Medivac grants Protected
20.longDescription: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

20.name: Reinforcements
20.description: Medivac appears at Altar, reduce cooldown
20.longDescription: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.

20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0

20.longDescription: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

abilities.name: Caduceus Reactor
abilities.description: When channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

abilities.name: Healing Beam
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 180 (200 + 4% per level) health per second as long as they are in range. After not channeling Healing Beam for 2 seconds, regenerate 6 Energy per second. Reactivate to switch targets. Self-cast or activate your Trait to cancel the channel.

abilities.name: Redirect Healing Beam
abilities.description: Redirect Healing Beam to another target. Use on self to cancel channeling.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.description: Grant target Ally 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Displacement Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

abilities.name: Stim Drone
abilities.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Medivac Dropship
abilities.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

1.name: Easy Prey
1.description: Misha is more effective against Minions and Mercs
1.longDescription: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Bird of Prey
1.description: Increases Spirit Swoop damage to Minions
1.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
4.longDescription: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower Misha, Charge! cooldown
7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.25 seconds.

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop slow amount and duration
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3 seconds.

7.name: Taking Flight
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop range, returns Mana
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

10.name: Bestial Wrath
10.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attacks
10.longDescription: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Send a pack of boars to hunt enemy Heroes
10.longDescription: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals damage to nearby enemies
13.longDescription: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.longDescription: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Basic Attacks increase damage of Misha, Charge!
13.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
16.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Attack and Move speed
16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Feign Death
16.longDescription: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals more damage and roots
20.longDescription: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal more damage, Misha's attacks slow
20.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: Rexxar and Misha gain massive Armor
20.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Passive:Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

abilities.name: Spirit Swoop
abilities.description: Deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Charge!
abilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Mend Pet
abilities.description: Heal Misha for 596 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Bestial Wrath
abilities.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Unleash the Boars
abilities.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Purge Evil
1.longDescription: Smite deals 30% more damage to Heroes.

1.name: Protection in Death
1.description: Upon death, grants nearby allies a Shield
1.longDescription: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 10 seconds.

1.name: Even In Death
1.description: Can use Basic Abilities before exploding
1.longDescription: Increases Archangel's Wrath's damage by 25%. Basic Abilities also can be used before exploding, but deal no damage.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.longDescription: Regen Globes increase Health Regen

4.name: Horadric Reforging
4.description: Reduces El'druin's Might cooldown when enemy is hit
4.longDescription: If El'druin's Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

4.name: Swift Retribution
4.description: Increases Smite's Movement Speed bonus and duration
4.longDescription: Increases Smite's Movement Speed by 10% and duration by 1 second.

4.name: Vigorous Strike
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Angel's Grace
7.description: El'druin's Might teleport grants Movement Speed
7.longDescription: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.longDescription: When Righteousness expires, it explodes for 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Zealotry
7.description: Increases Righteousness' duration and reduces cooldown
7.longDescription: Increases the duration of Righteousness by 50%, and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.longDescription: Abilities increase Basic Attack damage

10.name: Judgment
10.description: Charge and stun an enemy Hero
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: Create zone of Invulnerable
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.longDescription: Deals damage to nearby enemies

13.name: Angelic Absorption
13.longDescription: Enemies that attack Tyrael while shielded grant 240 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds.

13.name: Angelic Might
13.longDescription: Gain 80% increased damage on Tyrael's next Basic Attack within the next 5 seconds for each Hero hit by Smite.

16.name: Blade of Justice
16.description: El'druin's Might teleport increases Attack Speed
16.longDescription: After teleporting using El'druin's Might, Tyrael's Attack Speed is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Holy Ground
16.description: Teleporting using El'druin's Might makes a blocking field
16.longDescription: Create a ring that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

16.name: Salvation
16.description: Stronger Shield per nearby allied Hero
16.longDescription: Each allied Hero that is affected by Righteousness increases Tyrael's Shield amount by 45%.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to steal Health from your target
16.longDescription: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Judgment has increased range, reduced cooldown
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Sanctification increased duration, adds damage bonus
20.longDescription: Increases duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increases the damage of allies by 25%.

20.name: Nullification Shield

20.longDescription: Activate to gain massive Spell Armor

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

abilities.name: Archangel's Wrath
abilities.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 550 (+4% per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: El'Druin's Might
abilities.description: Deals 110 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies again.

abilities.name: Righteousness
abilities.description: Shields you for 336 (+4% per level) damage and nearby allies for 135 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Rake target area for 144 (+4% per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Judgment
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Sanctification
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

1.name: Shackler

1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 50% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals for 60% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Weaken
7.description: Increase Cursed Strikes Attack Speed reduction
7.longDescription: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.
