7.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks restore Health, Mana
7.longDescription: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.5% of his maximum Mana.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: Poison nearby enemies
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Summon Frost Mages to damage and Slow enemies
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.longDescription: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Executioner
13.longDescription: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage

16.name: Amplify Damage
16.longDescription: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

16.name: Corpse Explosion
16.longDescription: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 55 (+4% per level) damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.longDescription: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals, increase Skeleton damage
20.longDescription: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.  Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase Skeletal Mages Slow, Skeleton attacks Slow
20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.  Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Spectral Scythe reduces healing taken
20.longDescription: Enemies hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce Heroic cooldown
20.longDescription: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

abilities.name: Raise Skeleton
abilities.description: When a nearby enemy Minion dies, it becomes a Skeletal Warrior with 270 (+4% per level) Health that attacks for 23 (+4% per level) damage and last up to 15 seconds. Up to 4 Skeletal Warriors can be active at once.

abilities.name: Bone Armor
abilities.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 25% of your maximum Health for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Spectral Scythe
abilities.description: Summon a scythe that travels to Xul after 1 second, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Cursed Strikes
abilities.description: Xul's Basic Attack deals damage in a wide area and reduce the Attack Speed of Heroes and Summons by 40% for 2 seconds. Lasts 4 seconds once triggered.

abilities.name: Bone Prison
abilities.description: After a 2 seconds delay, deals 80 (+4% per level) damage and roots the target enemy Hero for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Skeletal Mages
abilities.description: Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.longDescription: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Egg Hunt
1.longDescription: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.name: A Fishy Deal
1.description: Kill Minions with Pufferfish to bribe Mercs
1.longDescription: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

4.name: Slime Time
4.longDescription: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125. Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.name: Tufferfish
4.longDescription: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

4.name: Living the Dream
4.longDescription: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

7.name: Black Lagoon
7.longDescription: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

7.name: Slippery When Wet
7.description: Move faster during Safety Bubble, reduce cooldown
7.longDescription: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble.

7.name: Time to Krill
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs
10.description: Swarm enemies with Murlocs
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.name: Octo-Grab
10.description: Stun and poke an enemy Hero
10.longDescription: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
13.longDescription: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

13.name: Fish Tank
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes grant Murky 75 Physical Armor against Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.name: Egg Shell
13.longDescription: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

16.name: Toxic Buildup
16.longDescription: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.name: Fish Oil
16.longDescription: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.name: Wrath of Cod
16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
20.description: March of the Murlocs can channel forever
20.longDescription: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
20.description: Increase Octo-Grab's damage
20.longDescription: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
20.description: Increase Health and respawn time
20.longDescription: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.name: Making Inky
20.description: Reduced Slime cooldown
20.longDescription: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Spawn Egg
abilities.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying. If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

abilities.name: Slime
abilities.description: Deal 86 (+4% per level) damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%. Deal 210 (+4% per level) damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

abilities.name: Pufferfish
abilities.description: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 (+5.5% per level) health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Safety Bubble
abilities.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

abilities.name: March of the Murlocs
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Octo-Grab
abilities.description: Murky summons an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

1.name: Spine Launcher
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

1.name: Fetid Touch
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pusule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

1.name: Growing Infestation
1.longDescription: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds but its cooldown is increased by 4 seconds.

1.name: Poppin' Pustules
1.longDescription: Increases the final damage of Weighted Pustule by 50% Quest: Detonate 10 Weighted Pustules without dying. Reward: Detonating a Weighted Pustule now applies its damage and Slow in an area.

4.name: One Good Spread...
4.description: Reduce Healing Pathogen cooldown after spreading
4.longDescription: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 40 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

4.name: Top Off
4.description: Healing Pathogen stronger on high Health target
4.longDescription: Healing Pathogen's heal over time on its initial target is increased by 50% while they are above 60% Health.

4.name: Biotic Armor
4.longDescription: Healing Pathogen grants 50 Physical Armor to its initial target while active on them.

4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
4.longDescription: Quest: Detonate 50 Healing Pathogens with Bio-Kill Switch. Reward: Increase Bio-Kill Switch's healing by 40%.

7.name: The Long Pitch
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 100%.

7.name: Within My Reach
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 50%.

7.name: It Hungers
7.description: Hitting Heroes reduces Lurking Arm cooldown
7.longDescription: Each time an enemy Hero is hit by Lurking Arm, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds, up to 6.5 seconds, and restore 5 Mana.

7.name: Targeted Excision
7.description: Detonate single Weighted Pustule to reduce cooldown
7.longDescription: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

10.name: Flailing Swipe
10.description: Knock back enemies in front of Stukov
10.longDescription: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

10.name: Massive Shove
10.description: Shove an enemy until they collide with terrain
10.longDescription: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 200 (+4% per level) damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

13.name: Reactive Ballistospores
13.description: Radiate Weighted Pustule at low Health
13.longDescription: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

13.name: Low Blow
13.description: Increase Lurking Arm damage to low Health targets
13.longDescription: Lurking Arm deals 150% more damage to enemy Heroes below 25% Health.

13.name: Lingering Spines
13.longDescription: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

13.name: Virulent Reaction
13.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule in Lurking Arm Roots
13.longDescription: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

16.name: Superstrain
16.description: Healing Pathogen heals when Stunned, Rooted
16.longDescription: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Universal Carrier
16.longDescription: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50%.

16.name: Pox Populi
16.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen
16.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

20.name: Controlled Chaos
20.description: Flailing Swipe only hits once, gains multiple charges
20.longDescription: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range. Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

20.name: Push Comes To Shove
20.description: Increase Massive Shove speed, can reduce cooldown
20.longDescription: Massive Shove travels 25% faster. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
20.description: Bio Kill-Switch detonates Lurking Arm
20.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Bio-Kill Switch
abilities.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 500 health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds.Can be cast while channeling Lurking Arm.

abilities.name: Healing Pathogen
abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 222 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds, and a single Healing Pathogen can spread to each allied Hero 1 time.Can cast it on self, and spread to self.Cannot spread to targets to whom it has already spread.

abilities.name: Weighted Pustule
abilities.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 damage upon expiring or being removed.

abilities.name: Lurking Arm
abilities.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that Silences enemies inside and deals 144 damage per second to them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.Deals 4 ticks of 36 damage per second. Each tick applies 0.25 seconds Silence.Does not damage Structures.

abilities.name: Massive Shove
abilities.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, taking 200 damage. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.Enemy Heroes are revealed as long as they being shoved.Enemy Heroes that collide with terrain are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Flailing Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

1.name: Transcendence
1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 103 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased move speed for 2 seconds.

1.name: Iron Fists
1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 30% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

1.name: Insight
1.description: Basic Attacks restore Mana, lower cooldowns
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana and grants a stack of Insight and gives 25% increased move speed for 2 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces the cooldown of all of Kharazim's Basic Abilities by 1.75 second.

4.name: Spirit Ally
4.description: Place a Spirit Ally that heals in an area
4.longDescription: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allies in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

4.name: Earth Ally
4.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants Physical Armor
4.longDescription: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.name: Air Ally
4.description: Place an Air Ally that reveals an area
4.longDescription: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 75 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Blinding Speed
7.longDescription: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

7.name: Heavenly Zeal
7.description: Breath of Heaven increases allies Move Speed
7.longDescription: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.

7.name: Blazing Fists
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Deadly Reach cooldown
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.name: Divine Palm
10.description: Prevent an ally from death
10.longDescription: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1141 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.name: Seven-Sided Strike
10.description: Become Invulnerable and strike nearby Heroes
10.longDescription: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Quicksilver
13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Fists of Fury
13.longDescription: Increases Deadly Reach's duration by 100%.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: Gain Physical Armor while Stunned, Rooted
13.longDescription: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Cleansing Touch
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
16.description: Radiant Dash launches a volley of blows
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 50% damage each.

16.name: Echo of Heaven
16.description: Breath of Heaven heals a second time
16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

16.name: Dash of Light
16.description: Radiant Dash increases Breath of Heaven healing
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 75% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Peaceful Repose
20.description: Reduces Divine Palm cooldown if they do not die
20.longDescription: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.name: Transgression
20.description: Seven-Sided Strike hits more
20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies

20.name: Epiphany
20.description: Activate to restore Mana and Radiant Dash charges
20.longDescription: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

abilities.name: Pick Your Trait
abilities.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.

abilities.name: Radiant Dash
abilities.description: Jump to an ally or enemy. Enemies are immediately hit with a Basic Attack.

abilities.name: Breath of Heaven
abilities.description: Heal nearby Heroes for 611 (290 + 4% per level) and give them 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Deadly Reach
abilities.description: Your next Basic Attack increases your Attack Speed and Attack Range by 100% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Seven-Sided Strike
abilities.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 1.81 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

abilities.name: Divine Palm
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 2501 (1187 + 4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: Basic Attacks lower Inner Beast cooldown
1.longDescription: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range and refunds Mana against Heroes
1.longDescription: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 50 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast duration, Abilities refresh
1.longDescription: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.longDescription: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Eyes in the Dark
4.longDescription: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore Mana
4.longDescription: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

4.name: Draught Overflow
4.longDescription: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.longDescription: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

7.name: Incendiary Elixir
7.longDescription: Quest: Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 15, up to 225. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is also reduced by 4 seconds.

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.longDescription: Quest: Hero takedowns increase Basic Attack damage by 3%, up to 30%. This bonus is lost on death.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Eviscerate a Hero, refresh cooldown if they die
10.longDescription: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.name: Cursed Bullet
10.description: Remove a portion of enemy's current Health
10.longDescription: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

13.name: Running Wild
13.longDescription: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Visceral Attacks
13.description: Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown
13.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: On the Prowl
13.longDescription: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.longDescription: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

16.name: Eager Wolf
16.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Increases Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes
16.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: Go for the Throat gets more powerful free casts
20.longDescription: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided that deals 35% more damage, up to 140%.

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: Cursed Bullet pierces, lower cooldown
20.longDescription: Cursed Bullet now hits all enemy heroes in its path and has its cooldown reduced by 5 seconds per hit.

20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
20.description: Basic Attacks splash
20.longDescription: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: form Basic Attacks cleave
20.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

abilities.name: Curse of the Worgen (Trait)
abilities.description: Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen. While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged. While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 40% more damage and you gain 10 Armor, taking 10% less damage.

abilities.name: Razor Swipe
abilities.description: Swipe towards the area in front of you for 135 (+4% per level) damage. Human Form: Gilnean Cocktail* Usable only in Worgen form.* Razor Swipe can move through units.

abilities.name: Gilnean Cocktail
abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 59 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 236 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen Form: Razor Swipe* Usable only in Human form.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration, and reduce the cooldown of Inner Beast by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Disengage
abilities.description: Roll away and shapeshift into a Human. Human Form: Darkflight* Usable only in Worgen form.* Shares cooldown with Darkflight.

abilities.name: Darkflight
abilities.description: Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+4% per level) damage. Worgen Form: Disengage* Usable only in Human form.* Shares cooldown with Disengage.

abilities.name: Go for the Throat
abilities.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.* Greymane is Unstoppable for the leap duration

abilities.name: Cursed Bullet
abilities.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage. Does not affect Vehicles.

1.name: Dream Shot
1.longDescription: Empowers Arcane Flare

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Soothing Mist reduces Phase Shift cooldown
1.longDescription: Soothing Mist reduces Phase Shift cooldown

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Heal Allies with Soothing Mist to bribe a Mercenary
1.longDescription: Each time Brightwing heals an Allied Hero with Soothing Mist, she gains a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.longDescription: Polymorphed targets explode

4.name: Manic Pixie
4.description: Pixie Dust increases Soothing Mist healing
4.longDescription: Pixie Dust increases Soothing Mist healing

4.name: Peekaboo!
4.longDescription: Empowers Phase Shift

7.name: Mistified
7.description: Basic Abilities reduce Soothing Mist cooldown
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities reduce Soothing Mist cooldown

7.name: Phase Shield
7.longDescription: Grant Shields upon arrival

7.name: Cleanse
7.longDescription: Makes target ally Unstoppable

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to allies and heal them
10.longDescription: Teleport to allies and heal them

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: Damages and pushes enemies in area
10.longDescription: Damages and pushes enemies in area

13.name: Sticky Flare
13.longDescription: Arcane Flare slows enemies

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust grants an additional burst of speed
13.longDescription: Pixie Dust grants an additional burst of speed

13.name: Shield Dust
13.longDescription: Pixie Dust grants Physical Armor

13.name: Ice Block
13.longDescription: Activate to become Invulnerable

16.name: Greater Polymorph
16.longDescription: Increases Polymorph duration

16.name: Critterize
16.longDescription: Polymorph lowers enemy's Armor

16.name: Bouncy Dust
16.longDescription: Pixie Dust bounces

16.name: Hardened Focus
16.longDescription: Faster cooldowns near full Health

20.name: Double Wyrmhole
20.description: Free Blink Heal on second target
20.longDescription: Free Blink Heal on second target

20.name: Continuous Winds
20.description: Emerald Wind gains two additional novas
20.longDescription: Emerald Wind gains two additional novas

20.name: Revitalizing Mist
20.description: Soothing Mist heals more subsequently
20.longDescription: Soothing Mist heals more subsequently

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies

abilities.name: Soothing Mist
abilities.description: Brightwing heals nearby allied Heroes for 115 (+4% per level) every 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Flare
abilities.description: Deal 274 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and 91 (+4% per level) damage in a larger area.

abilities.name: Polymorph
abilities.description: Polymorph a target for 1.25 seconds, Slowing their Movement Speed and Silencing them. Targets are not able to attack while Polymorphed.

abilities.name: Pixie Dust
abilities.description: Increase target's Movement Speed by 20%, and grant them 30 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Spell damage taken by 30%.

abilities.name: Blink Heal
abilities.description: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 204 (+4% per level). Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Emerald Wind
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away. Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 8%.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, teleport to an allied Hero.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.longDescription: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero. Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Root Heroes to empower Howling Blast
1.longDescription: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast. Reward: After rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Reward: After rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%. Reward: After rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Rime
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.longDescription: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 4 per second. Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest. Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.longDescription: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by seconds and increase its range by .
4.longDescription: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.longDescription: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain Armor, reducing damage taken by , and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by for seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Raise ghouls that fight enemies, heal Arthas
10.longDescription: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Disables enemies and Structures
10.longDescription: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds.  Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers cooldown and adds slow
13.longDescription: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.longDescription: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for seconds are rooted for seconds. This effect can only happen once every seconds.
16.longDescription: Damage slows targets Movement and Attack Speeds by 5% for 1.5 seconds. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases number of Frostmourne Hungers attacks
16.longDescription: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage when missing Health
16.longDescription: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: Ghouls last longer and more are created
20.longDescription: 3 additional Ghouls are created.  Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Increases Sindragosa range and disable duration
20.longDescription: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by for seconds. Increases Movement Speed by .
20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for seconds and heal Arthas for of the damage prevented.
20.longDescription: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

abilities.name: Frostmourne Hungers
abilities.description: Activate to make Arthas's next Basic Attack strike immediately, do 99 increased damage, and restore 30 Mana.

abilities.name: Death Coil
abilities.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage to target enemy. Can be self-cast to heal for 262 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Howling Blast
abilities.description: Root enemies within the target area for 1.25 seconds and deals 68 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Frozen Tempest
abilities.description: Mana: 15 per secondDeals 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Slows enemy Move Speed and Attack Speed by 10% per second, stacking up to 40%.

abilities.name: Army of the Dead
abilities.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Summon Sindragosa
abilities.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies by 60% for 3.5 seconds. Also disables non-Heroic enemies and Structures for 20 seconds.

1.name: Reinforce
1.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing damage taken by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Hold Your Ground
1.description: Increases Iron Skin Shield, reduced cooldown
1.longDescription: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

1.name: Laws of Hope
1.description: Increases Health Regen, activate to burst heal
1.longDescription: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Condemn cooldown reduced per enemy hit
4.longDescription: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.5 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

4.name: Conviction
4.longDescription: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

4.name: Sins Exposed
4.description: Shield Glare makes enemies take bonus damage
4.longDescription: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

7.name: Subdue
7.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay. Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish. Reward: Punish always Slows by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

7.name: Zealous Glare
7.longDescription: Increase the Blind duration of Shield Glare by 0.5 seconds. Johanna's Basic Attacks against Heroes with Shield Glare extend its duration by 1 second, up to a maximum of 3 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Momentum
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description: Jump to area, damaging and Slowing enemies
10.longDescription: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 183 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.188 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Throw a bouncing shield that Stuns
10.longDescription: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Roar
13.longDescription: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

13.name: Holy Fury
13.longDescription: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Hammer
13.longDescription: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Shield Glare heals for each Hero hit
16.longDescription: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

16.name: Fanaticism
16.description: Damage taken during Iron Skin grants Move Speed
16.longDescription: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: Falling Sword bombards enemies with holy bolts
20.longDescription: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increase Blessed Shield Stun duration, max targets
20.longDescription: Increases Blessed Shield's Stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

20.name: Indestructible
20.description: Gain a Shield instead of dying
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 5 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

20.name: Blinded By The Light
20.description: Activate to Shield nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to grant nearby allied Heroes a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Iron Skin
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 674 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Step forward dealing 113 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: After 1 second, Johanna pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Shield Glare
abilities.description: Deal 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and cause them to miss Basic Attacks for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Falling Sword
abilities.description: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 183 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.188 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Blessed Shield
abilities.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (4% per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

1.name: Thunderstroke
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

1.name: Seraph's Hymn
1.description: Basic Attacks reduce Blinding Light cooldown
1.longDescription: Reduce Blinding Light's Mana cost from 70 to 40. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 2 seconds.

1.name: Charged Strikes
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks against non-Structures to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Emit Blinding Light when Stunned or Rooted
4.longDescription:
Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location.  This effect has a 6 second cooldown. 
Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

4.name: Ring of the Leech
4.longDescription: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

4.name: Plate of the Whale
4.longDescription: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

7.name: Impale
7.longDescription: Enemies below 50% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

7.name: War Traveler
7.longDescription: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

7.name: Surge of Light
7.longDescription: After taking 500 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a bouncing lightning ball
10.longDescription: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie to impale enemies
10.longDescription: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: Grounding Bolt
13.longDescription: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Lunging Strike
13.longDescription: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Pierce
16.longDescription: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

16.name: Penetrate
16.description: Consecutive Fend hits deal increased damage
16.longDescription: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

16.name: Martial Law
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning bounces indefinitely
20.longDescription: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

20.name: Imprisoning Light

abilities.name: Avoidance (Trait)
abilities.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 65 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 65%.

abilities.name: Lightning Fury
abilities.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds.Passive: Cassia deals 20% increased damage to Blinded targets.

abilities.name: Fend
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes* Actually deals ticks of 39 damage every 0.125 seconds to a total of 12 ticks over it's duration* Maximum damage with untalented Fend is 468 (+4% per level).

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.* Prioritises enemy heroes and only bounces back to Cassia, if there are no enemy heroes in its bounce range* Ball Lightning going through Cassia counsumes a bounce normally.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

abilities.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Gorge

The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. Cannot be used on massive Heroes.Massive Heroes are Tassadar in Archon form and Tychus in Odin form.

abilities.description: Deals 141 (+4% per level) damage and pushes enemies away.

abilities.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.description: Gain Attack Speed, Lose Damage; Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike cooldown
10.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 315 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 21 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

abilities.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

1.name: Viking Bribery

1.longDescription: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!

16.name: Large and In Charge

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue

16.longDescription: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage

abilities.name: Play Again!
abilities.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

abilities.name: Longboat Raid!
abilities.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 245 (36 + 11 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 450 (70 + 20 per level) damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

abilities.name: Go Go Go!
abilities.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Taste for Blood
1.description: Kills increase Globe of Annihilation damage
1.longDescription: Quest: Kill enemy Minions and Heroes within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Globe of Annihilation. Reward: Enemy Minions that die increase its damage by 2.Reward: Enemy Heroes that die increase its damage by 10.  Maximum bonus damage of 500.

1.name: Sieging Wrath
1.description: Hitting Heroes empowers Globe of Annihilation
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Globe of Annihilation hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3, up to 90. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the range of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 33% and its damage is increased by an additional 100.

1.name: Master of Destruction
1.description: Reduces All Shall Burn Mana cost, increases Range
1.longDescription: Reduces the Mana cost from 16 to 10 per second. Every 1.5 seconds spent channeling increases the range by 8.5%, to a maximum of 25%.

4.name: Gluttony
4.longDescription: All Shall Burn heals Azmodan for 25% of the damage dealt.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Demon Warriors deal more damage, cost less Mana
4.longDescription: Increases Demon Warrior's damage by 20% and reduces their Mana cost by 20.

4.name: Hellish Hirelings
4.description: General of Hell improves Mercenary damage
4.longDescription: The damage bonus from General of Hell is doubled on Mercenaries.

4.name: Sin's Grasp
4.description: Activate to deal damage over time
4.longDescription: Activate to curse an enemy Hero, dealing 248 (+4% per level) damage over 8 seconds. Minion kills reduce this cooldown by 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: Infernal Globe
7.description: Reduces cast time and increases missile speed
7.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation's cast time is decreased by 40% and its missile speed is increased by 40%.

7.name: Bound Minion
7.description: General of Hell improves a Minion
7.longDescription: Using General of Hell on a Minion grants them 75 Armor from non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take by 75%, while also  increasing the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.

7.name: Gluttonous Ward
7.description: Place a ward that restores Azmodan's Health and Mana
7.longDescription: Activate to place a ward on the ground that restores 3% of Azmodan's maximum Health and Mana every second for 10 seconds. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

7.name: March of Sin
7.description: Increases All Shall Burn Movement Speed
7.longDescription: Increases Azmodan's Movement Speed while channeling All Shall Burn to 80% of normal speed.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Damage area and create an army of Grunts
10.longDescription: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

10.name: Black Pool
10.description: Create an empowering zone
10.longDescription: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Hellforged Armor
13.description: Demon Warriors burn enemies and take less damage
13.longDescription: Demon Warriors deal 10 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every second and are granted 50 Armor against non-Heroic sources, decreasing the damage they take 50%.

13.name: Hedonism
13.description: Reduces Globe of Annihilation Mana cost
13.longDescription: Reduces Globe of Annihilation's Mana cost by 30.

13.name: Infused Power
13.description: Increase All Shall Burn maximum damage
13.longDescription: All Shall Burn's damage growth maximum is increased by 40%.

16.name: Battleborn
16.description: Globe of Annihilation summons a Demon Warrior
16.longDescription: If Globe of Annihilation hits an enemy, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the impact point.

16.name: Demonic Smite
16.longDescription: Every 7.5 seconds, the Demon Lieutenant will blast a non-Heroic unit dealing 411 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Sin for Sin
16.description: Activate to steal Health from an enemy
16.longDescription: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount. Can be cast while channeling All Shall Burn.

20.name: Perishing Flame
20.description: Demonic Grunts explode on death
20.longDescription: When the Grunts die they explode, dealing 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals 100% increased damage to Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters, and Structures.

20.name: Fifth Circle
20.description: Black Pool gives slowing attacks
20.longDescription: Black Pool makes Basic Attacks and Abilities slow enemies Attack and Movement Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Forced Recruitment
20.description: Reduces General of Hell cooldown, gains a charge
20.longDescription: Reduces General of Hell's cooldown by 10 seconds and gains an additional charge.

abilities.name: General of Hell
abilities.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Azmodan's Summons. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Azmodan's Summons. Unlimited range.

abilities.name: Globe Of Annihilation
abilities.description: Shoot a globe of destruction, dealing 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact. Long range.

abilities.name: Summon Demon Warrior
abilities.description: Spawn a Demon Warrior that marches toward a point. Warriors deal 37 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 10.5 seconds.

abilities.name: All Shall Burn
abilities.description: Mana: 16 per secondChannel a death beam on an enemy dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage a second. The damage amount grows the longer it is channeled, to a maximum of 200 (+4% per level) damage per second. Does 25% more damage to Structures. Azmodan can move at 40% speed while channeling.

abilities.name: Black Pool
abilities.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their Basic Attack and Ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Demonic Invasion
abilities.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 104 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 51 (+4% per level) damage and have 365 (+4% per level) health.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Mitigate damage to improve Holy Light
1.longDescription: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.longDescription: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 second.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 second.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.name: Holy Shock
4.longDescription: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice grants Move Speed
4.longDescription: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.longDescription: Deal 14 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.name: Armor of Faith
7.description: Holy Light recharges faster while disabled
7.longDescription: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds.

7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
7.description: Increase Devotion's Armor on disabled targets
7.longDescription: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 15 to 50.

7.name: Hand of Protection
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

10.name: Divine Shield
10.description: Give ally Invulnerable and increased Move Speed
10.longDescription: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Divine Storm
10.description: Damage and stun nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Deal 187 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Champion
13.description: Holy Light makes Basic Attacks heal
13.longDescription: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allies for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

13.name: Well Met
13.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Periodically gain temporary Spell Armor

16.name: Beacon of Light
16.longDescription: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
16.longDescription: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Reduce Mana cost, cooldown of next ability
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Bulwark of Light
20.description: Increase Divine Shield duration, reduce cooldown
20.longDescription: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Increase Divine Storm radius, reduce cooldown
20.longDescription: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: Resurrect after Eternal Vanguard ends
20.longDescription: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Devotion stacks twice
20.longDescription: Devotion now stacks twice, and its duration is refreshed when applied.

abilities.name: Eternal Devotion
abilities.description: Heroes healed by Uther's Basic Abilities gain 15 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself. Upon dying, Uther becomes an Invulnerable spirit for up to 8 seconds. While in spirit form, Uther can heal allies with Flash of Light.

abilities.name: Holy Light
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 380 (+4% per level) Health. When used on a target other than Uther, also heal Uther for 190 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Flash of Light
abilities.description: Heal an ally for 242 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Holy Radiance
abilities.description: Heal all allies in a line for 185 (+4% per level) Health, dealing 185 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Hammer of Justice
abilities.description: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and stun the target for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Shield
abilities.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Divine Storm
abilities.description: Deal 187 (+4% per level) damage and stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

1.name: Mounting Sand
1.longDescription: Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Activate to reveal an area Regen Globes increase Mana Regen
1.longDescription: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chromie's Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.5. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes Chromie also gains 5% Spell Power.

4.name: Bronze Talons
4.description: Increase Basic Attack range and damage
4.longDescription: Increase Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

4.name: Enveloping Assault
4.description: Increase the radius of Dragon's Breath
4.longDescription: Increase Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

4.name: Timely Surprise
4.longDescription: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Reduce Dragon's Breath Mana, cooldown, damage
7.longDescription: Reduce Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduce its damage by 25%.

7.name: Dragon's Eye
7.longDescription: Dragon's Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

7.name: Chrono Sickness
7.description: Reduce Time Trap cooldown, Mana cost, adds Slow
7.longDescription: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Create a Slowing area
10.longDescription: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Return an enemy Hero to a previous position
10.longDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

13.name: Bye Bye!
13.longDescription: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to swap positions with Sand Blast Echo
13.longDescription: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

13.name: Time Out
13.longDescription: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: Long range Sand Blasts reduce its cooldown
16.longDescription: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Spell Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

20.name: Pocket of Time
20.description: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost, increase Slow
20.longDescription: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports twice
20.longDescription: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blast pierces
20.longDescription: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant bonus damage or Quest progress.

20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
20.description: Increase Time Trap charges
20.longDescription: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

abilities.name: Timewalker
abilities.description: Chromie has traveled to the future, and as such, will learn her Talents 2 levels earlier than her teammates!

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 300 (+2% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.❢  Quest: Hit 60 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes.❢ Reward: Each hero hit increases Sand Blast's damage by 5.❢ Reward: After hitting 60 Heroes, Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind. The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 480 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area. Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

abilities.name: Time Trap
abilities.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it will be put into Time Stop for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.* Time Traps can be destroyed by enemies.

abilities.name: Slowing Sands
abilities.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Temporal Loop
abilities.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

1.name: Echo Pulse
1.longDescription: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

1.name: Warp Resonance
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

1.name: Gather Minerals
1.description: Collect Minerals to empower Photon Cannons
1.longDescription: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560. Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

4.name: Photon Barrier
4.description: Gain Spell Armor while Photon Cannon is Active
4.longDescription: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

4.name: Turbo Charged
4.description: Move faster and decrease Worker Rush's cooldown
4.longDescription: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

4.name: Shield Capacitor
4.longDescription: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

7.name: Particle Accelerator
7.description: Increase damage for each target hit
7.longDescription: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

7.name: Rift Shock
7.description: Deal more damage to enemies caught in Warp Rift detonations
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

7.name: Tower Defense
7.longDescription: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Pylon Overcharge
10.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for damage per second. Lasts seconds.
10.longDescription: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

10.name: Null Gate
10.description: Create a slowing barrier
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

13.name: Aggressive Matrix
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

13.name: Power Overflowing
13.description: Power Fields give Spell Power, Mana
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

13.name: Shield Battery
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 116 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

16.name: Quantum Entanglement
16.longDescription: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

16.name: Gravity Well
16.description: Increase Warp Rift Slow amount in center
16.longDescription: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

16.name: Repulsor
16.description: Enemies are knocked away from Warp Rift detonations
16.longDescription: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

16.name: Interference
16.description: Warp Rift explosions reduce enemy Spell Power
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
20.description: Increase max Pylon count and Pylon Overcharge damage
20.longDescription: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

20.name: Gate Keeper
20.description: Indefinite duration while in Pylon Power
20.longDescription: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.  Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
20.description: Hitting a Warp Rift splits Disruption Pulse into several additional pulses
20.longDescription: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

20.name: Probius Loop
20.description: Create new Warp Rifts by hitting Heroes with explosions
20.longDescription: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 2 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

abilities.name: Warp In Pylon
abilities.description: Warp in a Pylon that generates a Power Field and grants vision of the surrounding area. Probius only regenerates mana while inside a Power Field. Up to 2 Pylons can be active at a time.

abilities.name: Disruption Pulse
abilities.description: Fire a burst of energy forward, dealing 142 (+5% per level) damage to all enemies it passes through. Hitting the center of a Warp Rift will cause it to explode, dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Warp Rift
abilities.description: Open an unstable Warp Rift at a location that takes 1.25 seconds to arm, which then slows nearby enemies by 25% lasting 9 seconds. Armed Warp Rifts explode when hit by Disruption Pulse, dealing 261 (+5% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Photon Cannon
abilities.description: Warp in a Photon Cannon that deals 105 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 13 seconds. Must be placed within a Pylon's Power Field. Deactivates if it doesn't have a Pylon powering it.

abilities.name: Pylon Overcharge
abilities.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 48 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.* Prioritizes Heroes.

abilities.name: Null Gate
abilities.description: Vector Targeting. Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 17 (+4% per level) damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

abilities.name: Worker Rush
abilities.description: Activate to gain an additional 50% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Taking damage ends this effect early.Passive: Probius moves 10% faster by hovering over the ground.

1.name: Monster Hunter
1.description: Reduces Hungering Arrow Mana cost and increases non-Hero damage
1.longDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

1.name: Caltrops
1.description: Drop Caltrops while Vaulting Maintain Hatred to empower Vault
1.longDescription: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

1.name: Hot Pursuit
1.description: Max Hatred increases Movement Speed and Mana Regen
1.longDescription: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

4.name: Puncturing Arrow
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

4.name: Punishment
4.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

4.name: Creed of the Hunter
4.description: Increases Attack Speed Attacking Heroes empowers Hatred
4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

7.name: Arsenal
7.longDescription: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

7.name: Death Dealer
7.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus
7.longDescription: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

7.name: Repeating Arrow
7.longDescription: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Unleashes a flurry of arrows at enemies
10.longDescription: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Area attack that stuns enemies
10.longDescription: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Siphoning Arrow
13.description: Hungering Arrow returns damage as Health
13.longDescription: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: Max Hatred grants healing on Basic Attacks
13.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Consume Hatred to gain Spell Armor
13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Frost Shot
16.description: Multishot slows enemies and has increased range
16.longDescription: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: Hatred stacks faster and lasts longer
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Consecutive Basic Attacks against Heroes are empowered
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Fires penetrating bolts and heals
20.longDescription: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks reduce Cooldown
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

20.name: Rancor
20.description: Hatred increases Attack Speed
20.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Increases Basic Attack range
20.longDescription: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

abilities.name: Hatred
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 307 (146 + 4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 176 (84 + 4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 360 (171 + 4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Your next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 132 (63 + 4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 493 (234 + 4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores 2 charges.

1.name: Press the Advantage
1.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range
1.longDescription: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

1.name: Dash
1.description: Regen Globes empower Run and Gun
1.longDescription: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds. Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

1.name: Combat Tactician
