1.description: Basic Attacks reduce Run and Gun cooldown
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.8 seconds.

4.name: In the Rhythm
4.longDescription: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by .03 seconds.

4.name: Fully Loaded
4.longDescription: Reduce Minigun's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...
4.description: Minigun Damage modified based on Target Health
4.longDescription: Increases Minigun damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

4.name: Master Assassin
4.longDescription: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%. Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

7.name: Quarterback
7.longDescription: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.name: Concussion Grenade
7.description: Increases Frag Grenade radius and knockback
7.longDescription: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

7.name: Relentless Soldier
7.longDescription: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot
10.longDescription: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: Call down a Laser to attack nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: That's the Stuff!
13.longDescription: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

13.name: Neosteel Coating
13.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

13.name: Spray 'n' Pray
13.longDescription: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

16.name: Titan Grenade
16.description: Increases Frag Grenade damage to Heroes
16.longDescription: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Lead Rain
16.longDescription: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 20%.

16.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
16.description: Increases Overkill damage to main target
16.longDescription: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Increases Odin duration and fires Nukes
20.longDescription: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increase Laser Drill range and damage
20.longDescription: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage to Heroes
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Adds Run and Gun charges and reduces Mana cost
20.longDescription: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

abilities.name: Minigun
abilities.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 1414 (671 + 4% per level) damage to the target and 691 (328 + 4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: Annihilate
abilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 430 (204 + 4% per level) damage to everything in the path.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 561 (267 + 4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Ragnarok Missiles
abilities.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Dash in target direction.

abilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 312 (148 + 4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

1.name: Block
1.longDescription: Periodically gain Physical Armor

1.name: Perfect Storm
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

1.name: Third Wind
1.longDescription: Increases Health Restoration rate to 80 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 159 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

4.name: Sledgehammer
4.description: Increases Storm Bolt damage to non-Heroes
4.longDescription: Deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Destroys 4 ammo from Structures.

4.name: Reverberation
4.description: Increases duration and Attack Speed reduction
4.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Thunder Burn
4.description: Thunder Clap can strike a second time
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Heavy Impact
7.description: Dwarf Toss briefly slows enemies hit
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are slowed by 80% for 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Give 'em the Axe!
7.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Skullcracker
7.description: Successive Basic Attacks Stun, deal more damage
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 70% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Avatar
10.description: Temporary Health boost
10.longDescription: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Haymaker
10.description: Stun and knock an enemy away
10.longDescription: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

13.name: Healing Static
13.longDescription: Muradin heals for 5% of his Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

13.name: Thunder Strike
13.description: Increases Thunder Clap damage to one enemy
13.longDescription: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

13.name: Bronzebeard Rage
13.longDescription: Deal 19 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Rooted, Stunned or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Dwarf Launch
16.longDescription: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed

16.name: Stoneform
16.longDescription: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: Avatar grants additional bonuses
20.longDescription: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Grand Slam
20.description: Increases Haymaker damage and adds charge
20.longDescription: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage its increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain massive Armor
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset cooldowns

abilities.name: Second Wind
abilities.description: Restore 53 (+4% per level) Health per second when you have not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 106 (+4% per level) Health per second.

abilities.name: Storm Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and stunning it for 1.25 seconds.❢  Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes.❢ Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Deals 96 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies Movement and Attack Speed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Dwarf Toss
abilities.description: Leap to target location, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

abilities.name: Avatar
abilities.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1124 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Haymaker
abilities.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

1.name: Give Me More!
1.longDescription: Increases Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
1.longDescription: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Reveals a large area, can be killed
1.longDescription: Reveals a large area, can be killed

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Periodically empower Basic Attacks against Heroes
4.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Vigorous Assault
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

4.name: Confident Aim
4.longDescription: Lowers the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 4 seconds if it hits an enemy Hero.

4.name: Relentless Leader
4.description: Knock enemies back when Stunned or Rooted
4.longDescription:
Being Stunned or Rooted knocks away nearby enemies.  This effect has a 8 second cooldown. 
Passive: The cooldown of Adrenaline Rush is reduced by 10 seconds.

7.name: Hamstring Shot
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Penetrating Round have a 20% Movement Speed slow for 3 seconds.

7.name: Revolution Overdrive
7.description: Gain Movement Speed per inspired Hero
7.longDescription: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

7.name: Fight or Flight
7.longDescription: Whenever Adrenaline Rush activates, it gives 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds.  Adrenaline Rush can also be manually activated.

7.name: Puttin' On a Clinic
7.description: Reduces cooldowns when killing enemy minions
7.longDescription: Whenever an enemy Minion Raynor has recently damaged is destroyed, his Ability cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Call down a strafing Battlecruiser
10.longDescription: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

10.name: Raynor's Raiders
10.description: Summon a pair of Banshee escorts
10.longDescription: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 50 (+4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
13.longDescription: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes

13.name: Double-Barreled
13.description: Penetrating Round gains a second charge
13.longDescription: Penetrating Round gains a second charge.

13.name: Steel Resolve
13.longDescription: Increases Inspire's duration by 50% and causes Adrenaline Rush to also apply Inspire.

16.name: Executioner
16.longDescription: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage

16.name: Cluster Round
16.longDescription: Penetrating Round damage is increased by 20% for each additional target hit up to 100%, and the width is increased by 50%.

16.name: Bullseye
16.description: Penetrating Round stuns first enemy hit
16.longDescription: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Scorched Earth
20.description: More shots dealing area damage
20.longDescription: An additional set of lasers blast the ground 5 times per second, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

20.name: Dusk Wings
20.description: Banshees stay cloaked, attack faster
20.longDescription: Banshees remain Stealthed while attacking and fire 50% more frequently.

20.name: A Card to Play
20.description: Hero deaths lower Heroic cooldown
20.longDescription: Whenever a Hero (ally or enemy) is killed, the cooldown of Raynor's Heroic Ability is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed and Range
20.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed and Range

abilities.name: Advanced Optics
abilities.description: Raynor's Basic Attack range is 1 further than most other ranged Heroes, and his vision radius 1 further as well.

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deals 240 (+4% per level) damage and knocks enemies back.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.Attack speed bonus is halved, duration is not.Attack speed stacks additively with other sources of attack speed.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Automatically activates to heal for 440 (+4% per level) when Raynor is below 30% Health.

abilities.name: Hyperion
abilities.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+4% per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.Hyperion shoots once per second and Yamato Cannon once per 4 seconds.Hyperion grants vision over the area.

abilities.name: Raynor's Raiders
abilities.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 50 (+4% per level) damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.Banshees are Summons.Banshees have attack speed of 0.8/s and attack in bursts of 2 missiles dealing 31 Physical damage each.Banshees have 766 base health.Banshees can be affected by Inspire.Banshees cloak after 2 seconds of not attacking or taking damage.An enemy must be targeted to summon Banshees, but they can be retargeted to move to a point.

1.name: Sustaining Power
1.longDescription: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.longDescription:
Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.
Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.longDescription: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.description: Hit Heroes to increase Discord Strike damage
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Negatively Charged
4.longDescription: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.longDescription: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 77 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Dissonance
7.longDescription: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.longDescription: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism, increase Telekinesis distance, range
7.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: Channel to charge a long distance
10.longDescription:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. 
This ability will take over your Trait button.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
10.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over your Trait button.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.longDescription: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Mark and damage Hero to increase Sadism
13.longDescription:
Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds. 
Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
16.description: Discord Strike grants Sadism bonus to Basic Attacks
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Center hits grant free Lightning Surge cast
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Counter-Strike (Lvl 20)
20.description: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
20.longDescription: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area

20.name: Deadly Charge (Lvl 20)
20.description: Channel to charge a long distance
20.longDescription: Channel to charge a long distance

20.name: Last Laugh
20.description: Cleanse and teleport, but reduce Health
20.longDescription: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

20.name: Hasty Bargain
20.description: Activate to reduce Sadism bonus and reset Basic Ability cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

abilities.name: Sadism (Trait)
abilities.description: Passive: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

abilities.name: Discord Strike
abilities.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 (+4% per level) damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Vector TargetingCreate a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.* Self-casting this ability pushes Alarak (and nearby enemies) to the direction he's facing.

abilities.name: Lightning Surge
abilities.description: Deal 62 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and an additional 100% damage to enemies between Alarak and the target. Restore 70 (+4% per level) health for each Hero hit.* The center bonus damage does not benefit from Sadism.

abilities.name: Deadly Charge
abilities.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.*Ability can be channeled indefinitely, but damage and distance will no longer increase after 1.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Counter-Strike
abilities.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay duration, radius
1.longDescription: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Increase Frost Nova center damage, duration
1.longDescription: Frost Nova deals 50% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Chains deals more damage, reduces Armor
1.longDescription: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 120 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Collect Regen Globes for instant respawn
4.longDescription: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain Physical Armor, Slow enemies
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.longDescription: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

7.name: Glacial Spike
7.description: Create a spike that explodes, deals damage
7.longDescription: Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 220 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.

7.name: Chilling Touch
7.description: Basic Attacks periodically deal area Spell damage
7.longDescription: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits nearby enemies, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

10.name: Frost Blast
10.description: Root and damage enemies around a target
10.longDescription: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Deal high damage in an area
10.longDescription: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 400 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.longDescription: Increase Frost Nova's Slow duration by 2 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.longDescription: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling Heroes together reduces Chains cooldown
13.longDescription: Pulling two Heroes together with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.longDescription: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Frost Nova makes enemies take bonus damage
16.longDescription: Enemies Rooted by Frost Nova take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad during the next 4 seconds.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.longDescription: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: Frost Blast Slows, Takedowns release blasts
20.longDescription: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: Hitting Heroes resets Shadow Fissure cooldown
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets it cooldown.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash and deal damage
20.longDescription: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return
20.description: Create Shades that mimic Death and Decay
20.longDescription: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

abilities.name: Master of the Cold Dark
abilities.description: ❢  Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad.❢ Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, the cooldown of all Basic Abilities is reduced by 2 seconds.❢ Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.

abilities.name: Death and Decay
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 70 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 212 damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

abilities.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
abilities.description: Launch a chain, dealing 97 damage to the first enemy Hero or Structure hit. For 4 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains of Kel’Thuzad can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 damage to its target and 275 damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frozen Tomb are Rooted for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Fissure
abilities.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 400 damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

1.name: Immolation
1.longDescription: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.longDescription: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Unending Hatred
1.description: Killing enemies grants Basic Attack damage
1.longDescription: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Rapid Chase
4.longDescription: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

4.name: Friend or Foe
4.description: Increases Dive range and can Dive to allies
4.longDescription: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

4.name: Unbound
4.description: Sweeping Strike can go over terrain
4.longDescription: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.longDescription: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Thirsting Blade
7.longDescription: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Damage area and increase max Health
10.longDescription: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge a target from a very long range
10.longDescription: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.longDescription: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.longDescription: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.longDescription: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.longDescription: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Consecutive Basic Attacks to Heroes are empowered
16.longDescription: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage
16.longDescription: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Demon form lasts forever, grants Attack Speed
20.longDescription: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: Increases The Hunt range and reveal low Health Heroes
20.longDescription: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance

abilities.name: Betrayer's Thirst
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.* Getting Blinded makes you inable to hit enemies and gain cooldown reduction.

abilities.name: Dive
abilities.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases your Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increase your maximum Health by 200 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. Lasts for 18 seconds.* While performing the transformation, Illidan is removed from the battlefield for 1.25 seconds making him Untargettable and immune to damage.* Bonus health is calculated and damage is dealt when transfomation period ends and Illidan reappears on the battlefield.* Illidan's current health is increased by the same flat amount as his maximum health. Current health is not reduced once Metamorphosis ends.* Removes Root, Slow, Blind and Armor debuffs on cast, but not Damage over Time effects, Revealed status or hero-specific debuffs like Jaina's "Chill".

abilities.name: The Hunt
abilities.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.* Has 1 second cast time that is interruptable with Stuns and Silences.* After the cast period, Illidan is Unstoppable, until he hits his target.

1.name: Ranger
1.longDescription: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals more damage based on the distance traveled, up to 75%. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Sentinel increases the maximum damage bonus by 3%.

1.name: Lunar Blaze
1.description: Hit Heroes to empower Lunar Flare
1.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Hitting Heroes with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 3%. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Lunar Flare no longer has a Mana cost. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase the range of Lunar Flare by 40%.

1.name: Ranger's Mark
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 1 second.

4.name: Moonlit Arrows
4.description: Increase Light of Elune cooldown reduction
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Celestial Attunement
4.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns and Silences
4.longDescription: Light of Elune removes Stuns and Silences from its target. When a Stun or Silence is removed this way, Light of Elune may be used for free within 4 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Celestial Attunement.

4.name: Kaldorei Resistance
4.description: Light of Elune grants Spell Armor
4.longDescription: Light of Elune grants the target 15 Spell Armor for 6 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

7.name: Huntress' Fury
7.description: Hunter's Mark makes Basic Attacks splash
7.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Hunter's Mark by 50%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby Heroes and Mercenaries.

7.name: Darnassian Archery
7.description: Consecutive Basic Attacks deal more damage
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 5% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

7.name: Trueshot Aura
7.longDescription: Passively grant 10% increased Attack Damage to nearby allied Heroes. Activate to double this bonus for 5 seconds.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Stealth and gain Movement Speed
10.longDescription: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Damages and slows enemies in an area
10.longDescription: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Quickening Blessing
13.description: Light of Elune increases Movement Speed
13.longDescription: Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Empower
13.longDescription: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 2 seconds. Every time it hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by an additional 4 seconds.

13.name: Harsh Moonlight
13.description: Sentinel Slows and reduces damage dealt
13.longDescription: Sentinel Slows the target by 25% and reduces their damage dealt by 25% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Overflowing Light
16.description: Increase Light of Elune healing at high Health
16.longDescription: While Tyrande is above 60% Health, Light of Elune's healing is increased by 30%.

16.name: Mark of Mending
16.longDescription: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Elune's Chosen
16.longDescription: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 5 seconds.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
20.description: Shadowstalk reveals enemy Heroes
20.longDescription: After casting Shadowstalk, reveal all enemy Heroes for 3 seconds.

20.name: Celestial Wrath
20.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to Heroes
20.longDescription: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes hit.

20.name: Shooting Star
20.description: Basic Attacks periodically cast Lunar Flare
20.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Every 10 Basic Attack against Heroes casts a free Lunar Flare at a random Hero near Tyrande's position.

20.name: Iceblade Arrows
20.description: Gain Attack Speed, reduce enemy damage dealt
20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
abilities.description: Reveal a target enemy and lower their Armor by 25 for 4 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%. Cannot be used on Structures.

abilities.name: Light of Elune
abilities.description: Heal target ally for 270 (+4% per level) Health. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of this Ability by 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Sentinel
abilities.description: Send an Owl that travels across the battleground revealing its path. Deals 173 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.❢  Quest: Every 8 Heroes hit by Sentinel decrease its Mana cost by 10 and cause it to pierce an additional target.

abilities.name: Lunar Flare
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 205 (+4% per level) damage and stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadowstalk
abilities.description: Stealth and gain 30% Movement Speed. When Shadowstalk's Stealth is broken, gain 50% Attack Speed and retain its Movement Speed bonus for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Starfall
abilities.description: Deal 91 (+4% per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks
1.longDescription: Kill enemies to empower Basic Attacks

1.name: Wingman
1.description: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary and empower Lightning Rod
1.longDescription: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Gain Shields after every Lightning Rod strike
4.longDescription: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll range and Shield
4.longDescription: Increases Barrel Roll's range, Shield amount, and Shield duration by 40%.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang range, Basic Attack damage
7.longDescription: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Activate Hammerang second time for more damage
7.longDescription: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases Lightning Rod strikes and range
7.longDescription: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: Long range damage beam
10.longDescription: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.8% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push away enemies and slow them
10.longDescription: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.longDescription: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.longDescription: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Crippling Hammer
16.longDescription: Increases Hammerang's slow from 25% to 50%.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduce Tailwind delay, increase Move Speed
16.longDescription: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.longDescription: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Increases Hinterland Blast range and damage
20.longDescription: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust constantly knocks back
20.longDescription: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed and Range
20.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduces Flight cooldown and delay
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hammerang
abilities.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 121 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.* Hammerang hits once on both throw and return.

abilities.name: Lightning Rod
abilities.description: Deal 107 (+4% per level) to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target.* Missing a lightning strike causes the ability to end.* Strikes once per second and deals total of 407 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Barrel Roll
abilities.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+4% per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Hinterland Blast
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

abilities.name: Mighty Gust
abilities.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.* Always pushes a set distance regardless of the distance between Falstad and the affected enemy.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.* Has 2 second cast time, during which it can be cancelled or interrupted by enemy abilities that Stun, Silence, Stasis or Knockback. Taking damage does not interrupt the cast.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Glyph of Drain Life
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Hit Heroes with Corruption to increase strikes
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Gather Regen Globes to reduce Mana costs
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes Gul'dan's next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 40 Mana Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes Gul'dan's Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Killing enemies with Drain Life refreshes its cooldown
4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.longDescription: Life Tap now restores 35% Mana

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion to heal
4.longDescription: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Fel Flame hits reduce the cooldown of Corruption
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

7.name: Devour the Frail
7.description: Drain Life deals more damage to weakened enemies
7.longDescription: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.longDescription: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Gain Spell Power but reduce healing received
7.longDescription: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: Deals damage and Fears Heroes
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area
10.longDescription: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.longDescription: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.longDescription: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but his Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.longDescription: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.longDescription: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Life Tap to gain Spell Power
16.longDescription: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 25% increased Spell Power.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases Horrify duration, lower enemies' Armor
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 25 Armor, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemy Movement Speed
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle that Gul'dan can teleport to
20.longDescription: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

abilities.name: Life Tap
abilities.description: 222 Life (+4% per level)Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% mana.* Cannot be used, if Gul'dan is at maximum Mana or if using Life Tap would be lethal.* Life Tap's cost equals to 13% of your maximum Health.

abilities.name: Fel Flame
abilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 200 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 (+4% per level) Health per second.* Stationary channel, can be cancelled by reactivating the Ability* Damage and Healing are dealt 4 ticks/second to a total of 12 ticks

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204(+4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.* Damage is dealt 1 tick per second, but individually for every burts hit* Hero can't be hit with more than 3 bursts. Further bursts don't refresh the duration or increase the damage.

abilities.name: Horrify
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and forced to run away from Horrify's center.

abilities.name: Rain of Destruction
abilities.description: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.* Spawns total of 56 meteors in randomly chosen points in the AoE.

1.name: Rush-down
1.description: Reduced Boosters cooldown if used out of combat
1.longDescription: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

1.name: Hit the Nitrous
1.longDescription: Initial speed of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

1.name: Crash Course
1.longDescription: Quest:Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

4.name: Diverting Power
4.description: Increase Defense Matrix size, Move Speed reduced
4.longDescription: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by an additional 30% for the duration.

4.name: Get Through This!
4.longDescription: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

4.name: Fusion Generator
4.longDescription: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

4.name: Bring It On
4.longDescription: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

7.name: Coming Through
7.longDescription: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

7.name: Dazer Zone
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

7.name: Aggression Matrix
7.description: Basic Attacks lower Defense Matrix cooldown
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

7.name: Nuclear Option
7.longDescription: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: Become Unstoppable and Slow nearby Heroes
10.longDescription: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Big Shot
10.description: Damage enemies in a line as a Pilot
10.longDescription: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

13.name: Expensive Plating
13.description: Increase Mech Health and Call Mech cooldown
13.longDescription: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

13.name: Emergency Shielding
13.description: Mech gains a Shield instead of dying
13.longDescription: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Ablative Armor
13.description: Take less damage from weak attacks
13.longDescription: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

16.name: Torpedo Dash
16.longDescription: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

16.name: GG, WP
16.description: Increased Pilot damage, Takedowns refresh Mech
16.longDescription: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

16.name: Nanoweave Suit
16.description: Faster Call Mech, ejection grants Armor
16.longDescription: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

16.name: Suppressing Fire
16.description: Pilot Basic Attacks Slow, range increased
16.longDescription: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Bunny Hop damage increased if stationary
20.longDescription: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
20.description: Big Shot fires multiple pulses
20.longDescription: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

20.name: Concussive Pulse
20.description: Knockback enemies as a Pilot
20.longDescription: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

20.name: MEKAfall
20.description: Call Mech is instant and targetable, damages enemies
20.longDescription: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

abilities.name: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech is destroyed, she is ejected after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight in Pilot Mode. Destroying D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP.

abilities.name: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Each Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon death.

abilities.name: Boosters (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Increases D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 (+4% per level) damage and are knocked away. D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn. Damage dealt to the Mech by enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 (+4% per level) to 1200 (+4% per level) damage in a large area, depending on distance from the center of the blast. Deals 50% damage against Structures. Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent using Basic Attacks, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.Can be activated while Boosters are active.When set on self-destruct, D.Va's Mech becomes an Unkillable Heroic Pet that can be affected by Crowd Control, including Polymorph, and Stasis effects like Stitches' Gorge.Crowd Control effects neither delay nor suppress Mech's explosion, they can only affect its position. The explosion can only be delayed by the Time Stop effect.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. 45 second cooldown. While in Pilot Mode, each Basic Attack lowers this cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing (+4% per level) 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Big Shot
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Call Mech's cooldown is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

1.name: Guitar Hero
1.description: Basic Attacks heal during Guitar Solo
1.longDescription: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100 Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

1.name: Block Party
1.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.longDescription: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain.

4.name: Loud Speakers
4.description: Increases range and knockback of Face Melt
4.longDescription: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

4.name: Speed Metal
4.description: Move Speed is added to Rockstar
4.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Increases Face Melt damage after Powerslide
7.longDescription: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

7.name: Hammer-on
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, E.T.C.'s next 2 Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: Nearby enemies must dance
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Dive to a location and deal damage
10.longDescription: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Reduces Face Melt cooldown when hitting multiple enemies
13.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt will knock enemies away a second time
13.longDescription: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.longDescription: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

16.name: Show Stopper
16.longDescription: After using Powerslide, gain 15 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 15%.

16.name: Aggressive Shredding
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce Guitar Solo cooldown
16.longDescription: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 second.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Makes Powerslide usable during Mosh Pit
20.longDescription: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive impact area bigger, cooldown reduced
20.longDescription: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Dying causes Mosh Pit
20.longDescription: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to grant Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance

abilities.name: Rockstar
abilities.description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 20 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

abilities.name: Powerslide
abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

abilities.name: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Guitar Solo
abilities.description: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Stage Dive
abilities.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Echo of the Elements
1.description: Killing enemies grants Chain Lightning charge
1.longDescription: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 45 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

1.name: Crash Lightning
1.description: Multiple Hero hits empower Chain Lightning
1.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 480. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 20 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: Chain Lightning restores Mana, increased range
1.longDescription: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana.  Passive: Increase the range of Chain Lightning by 30% and the number of bounces by 1.

4.name: Feral Resilience
4.description: Feral Spirit grants Physical Armor, Frostwolf Resilience
4.longDescription: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience, and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

4.name: Frostwolf Pack
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores Mana, lowers cooldowns
4.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
7.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.name: Ancestral Wrath
7.description: Activate to damage and steal Health from a Hero
7.longDescription: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.name: Follow Through
7.longDescription: Abilities increase Basic Attack damage

10.name: Sundering
10.description: Damages, pushes, and Stuns enemies in a line
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: Slows enemies in a massive area
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.longDescription: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
13.description: Activate Frostwolf Resilience to instantly heal
13.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.  Frostwolf's Grace's activation has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Spirit Shield
13.longDescription: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.longDescription: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Thunderstorm
16.description: Hit Heroes to make Chain Lightning Slow
16.longDescription: Casting Chain Lightning on a Hero other than the last Hero it was cast on causes it to Slow targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Each consecutive cast against a new Hero increases this bonus by 8%, up to 40%. Bonuses are reset if Thrall dies or casts Chain Lightning on the same Hero twice. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.

16.name: Alpha Wolf
16.description: Feral Spirit has longer Root, empowers Attacks
16.longDescription: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Sundering creates impassable terrain
20.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: Grants allies Shields in area
20.longDescription: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

20.name: Wind Rush
20.description: Activate to teleport and gain Windfury
20.longDescription: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

abilities.name: Frostwolf Resilience
abilities.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 223 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 178 (+4% per level) damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 89 (+4% per level) damage to each enemy hit.

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

abilities.name: Windfury
abilities.description: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

abilities.name: Sundering
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1 seconds.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

1.name: Vigor
1.longDescription: Valeera regenerates an additional 2 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.name: Subtlety
1.longDescription: After remaining Vanished for at least 4 seconds, using Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote causes Valeera to regenerate an additional 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Readiness
1.longDescription: Each Combo Point spent grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Crippling Poison
1.longDescription: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Vanish.

4.name: Relentless Strikes
4.longDescription: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 10.

4.name: Hemorrhage
4.longDescription: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 25% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.name: Initiative
4.description: Stealth Abilities award more Combo Points
4.longDescription: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 1 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Spell Damage reduces enemy healing received
4.longDescription: Activate to cause Valeera's next instance of Spell Damage to also reduce healing received by the victim by 50% for 5 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Vanish.

7.name: Mutilate
7.description: Increases Sinister Strike damage but reduces range
7.longDescription: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 100% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.name: Fatal Finesse
7.longDescription: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 3, up to 60. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.name: Slice and Dice
7.longDescription: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes Valeera's next 3 Basic Attacks to have their Attack Speed increased by 150%. Lasts 3 seconds.

7.name: Assassinate
7.description: Ambush deals more damage to isolated Heroes
7.longDescription: Ambush deals 100% additional damage if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

10.name: Smoke Bomb
10.description: Create an obscuring cloud of smoke
10.longDescription: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

10.name: Cloak of Shadows
10.description: Become Unstoppable, gain Spell Armor
10.longDescription: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

13.name: Elusiveness
13.longDescription: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 10%.

13.name: Death From Above
13.description: Ambush teleports Valeera behind her victim
13.longDescription: Ambush now has 6 range and teleports Valeera behind the victim.

13.name: Blind
13.longDescription: When Cheap Shot expires, the victim is blinded for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Strangle
13.longDescription: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 25% for 7 seconds.

16.name: Seal Fate
16.description: Empower Sinister Strike damage, Combo Points
16.longDescription: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against silenced, rooted, or stunned enemy Heroes.

16.name: Rupture
16.longDescription: Valeera's Basic Attacks increase the damage over time effect of Garrote by 5%, stacking up to 30%, and refresh the duration.

16.name: Expose Armor
16.longDescription: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points causes them to lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds, increasing all damage taken by 25%.

16.name: Thistle Tea
16.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Vanish.

20.name: Adrenaline Rush
20.description: Smoke Bomb increases Energy regeneration
20.longDescription: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 30 Energy per second.

20.name: Enveloping Shadows
20.description: Vanish grants Cloak of Shadows
20.longDescription: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

20.name: Nightslayer
20.description: Reduces Vanish cooldown
20.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Vanish
abilities.description: Valeera vanishes from sight, becoming Stealthed and increasing her Movement Speed by 10%. For the first second, she is Unrevealable and can pass through other units.Using Vanish grants Valeera an alternate set of Abilities that she can use while Stealthed.

abilities.name: Sinister Strike
abilities.description: Dash foward, hitting all enemies in a line for 114.4 (+4% per level damage). If Sinister Stike hits a Hero, Valeera stops dashing immediately and the cooldown is reduced to 1 second.Awards 1 Combo Point.Stealth: AmbushHeavily damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Ambush the target, instantly dealing 187.2 (+4% per level) damage to the target.Awards 1 Combo Point.Unstealth: Sinister StrikeDash foward, damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Blade Flurry
abilities.description: Deal 135.2 (+4% per level) damage in an area around Valeera.Awards 1 Combo Point per enemy Hero hit.Stealth: Cheap ShotStun and damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Cheap Shot
abilities.description: Deal 31.2 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and stun them for 1.25 seconds.Awards 1 Combo Point.Unstealth: Blade FurryDeal damage around Valeera.

abilities.name: Eviscerate
abilities.description: Consume all stored Combo Points to Eviscerate an enemy, dealing increased damage per Combo Point spent.1 Point: 85 (+4% per level)2 Points: 208 (+4% per level)1 Point: 312 (+4% per level)Stealth: GarroteSilence and damage an enemy over time.

abilities.name: Garrote
abilities.description: Garrote an enemy, instantly dealing 20 (+4% per level) to the target, as well as a larger amount of bonus damage over 15 seconds, and silencing them for 2.25 seconds.Awards 1 Combo Point.Unstealth: EviscerateHigh damage finishing move.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use Abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

abilities.name: Cloak of Shadows
abilities.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 second, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability damage taken by 75%.Using this Ability does not break Vanish.

1.name: Grenade Calibration
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Biotic Grenade. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Biotic Grenade does 75% more damage per allied and enemy Hero hit. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Biotic Grenade's duration on allies is increased from 4 seconds to 12 seconds, and its healing radius is increased by 100%.

1.name: Piercing Darts
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Sleep Dart. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes, Sleep Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 50%. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Healing Dart now hits 2 Heroes and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Detachable Box Magazine
1.longDescription: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 5 times, Doses deal 50% increase damage to enemies with 5 Doses. Reward: After reaching maximum Dosage 15 times, unlock the Active Reload Ability, which can be activated to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

4.name: Overdose
4.longDescription: Hitting enemies with Sleep Dart applies 3 Doses.

4.name: Aim Down Sights
4.description: Activate Shrike to increase vision, range
4.longDescription: Shrike can be activated to increase vision radius by 100% and Basic Attack range by 2 but reduce Movement Speed by 20%. Lasts until canceled.

4.name: Air Strike
4.description: Activate to throw Biotic Grenade farther
4.longDescription: Activate to use Biotic Grenade with a 200% increased range, but Grenades thrown this way take 4 seconds to land.  Passive: Reduce Biotic Grenade cooldown by 4 seconds.

7.name: Temporary Blindness
7.longDescription: After Sleep Dart's effects wear off, targets are Blinded for 2 seconds.

7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
7.longDescription: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 15%.

7.name: Debilitating Dart
7.longDescription: Activate to fire a dart which reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Nano Boost
10.description: Grant ally Spell Power, reduced cooldowns
10.longDescription: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

10.name: Eye of Horus
10.description: Fire unlimited range healing and damaging rounds
10.longDescription: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 8 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 300 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 175 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

13.name: Speed Serum
13.longDescription: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Purifying Darts
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

13.name: Smelling Salts
