13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

16.name: Sharpshooter
16.longDescription: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% each time it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

16.name: Concentrated Doses
16.longDescription: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

16.name: Contact Healing
16.description: Increase Biotic Grenade healing on multiple Heroes
16.longDescription: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Nano Infusion
20.description: Nano Boost heals for damage dealt
20.longDescription: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

20.name: Ballistic Advantage
20.description: Eye of Horus rounds explode
20.longDescription: Eye of Horus rounds explodes upon impacting a Hero, healing nearby allies for 300 (+4% per level) and dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Somnolent Doses
20.description: Max Dosage puts enemies to Sleep
20.longDescription: Upon stacking 5 Doses, Heroes are put to Sleep for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dynamic Shooting
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 4 seconds, up to 100%.

20.name: Custom Optics
20.description: Increase Aim Down Sights range bonus
20.longDescription: Increase the Aim Down Sights Basic Attack range bonus from 2 to 4.

abilities.name: Shrike
abilities.description: Basic Attacks apply a Dose to non-Structure enemies, dealing an additional 44 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds, and stacking up to 5 times.

abilities.name: Healing Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart which heals the first allied Hero hit for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Toss a Grenade at the target area. Allied Heroes hit are are healed for 175 (+4% per level) Health and receive 25% increased healing for 4 seconds. Enemies hit take 60 (+4% per level) damage and receive 100% less healing for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fire a dart that puts the first enemy Hero hit to Sleep, rendering them unable to act for 3 seconds. Sleep's effects end instantly if the target takes damage after the first 0.5 seconds. Cannot be used on Vehicles.

abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.Cannot be used on Ana.

abilities.name: Eye of Horus
abilities.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 8 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds hit the first allied or enemy Hero or enemy Structure in their path. Allies are healed for 300 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 175 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

1.name: Demolitions Expert
1.description: Increases Particle Grenade radius and reduces cooldown
1.longDescription: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds. Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

1.name: Together We Are Strong
1.description: Allied damage dealt with Shield Ally contributes to Energy
1.longDescription: Every 6 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 30 Energy per shield.

1.name: Feel the Heat
1.description: Basic Attack deals more damage to close enemies
1.longDescription: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.

1.name: Maximum Charge
1.description: Regen Globes grant Energy: Increases maximum Energy
1.longDescription: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy. Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy. Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

4.name: I Am the Strongest
4.longDescription: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Give Me Twenty
4.description: Increases Shield Ally absorb amount and reduces cooldown
4.longDescription: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently. Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

4.name: Speed Barrier
4.description: Shield Ally increases allied Hero Movement Speed
4.longDescription: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

4.name: Defensive Shielding
4.description: Personal Barrier, Shield Ally grant Physical Armor
4.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Pinpoint Accuracy
7.description: Particle Grenade deals more damage in center area
7.longDescription: Particle Grenade deals 40% more damage to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

7.name: Explosive Barrier
7.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 100 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: To the Limit
7.description: Increases Basic Attack size at high Energy
7.longDescription: While above 50 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

7.name: Hit Me
7.description: Shield damage absorbed contributes more Energy
7.longDescription: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 15% more Energy.

10.name: Graviton Surge
10.description: Launch a gravity bomb that draws in enemies
10.longDescription: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Expulsion Zone
10.description: Launch a bomb that continually pushes enemies
10.longDescription: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

13.name: Unstoppable Competitor
13.longDescription: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

13.name: Spell Barrier
13.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

13.name: Endurance Training
13.longDescription: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

13.name: Pain is Temporary
13.description: Consume Energy to gain a Shield
13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal shield active on herself at a time.

16.name: Plasma Shock
16.description: Particle Grenade slows enemies near the center
16.longDescription: Particle Grenade slows Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds to enemies near the center.

16.name: Cleansing Shield
16.description: Shield Ally removes all disabling effects
16.longDescription: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Gain Train
16.description: Shield Ally now affects a second ally
16.longDescription: Shield Ally now grants an untalented shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

16.name: Born in Battle
16.longDescription: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

20.name: Gravity Kills
20.description: Graviton Surge has increased duration and deals damage
20.longDescription: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and causes it to deal 175 (+4% per level) damage over the duration.

20.name: Clear Out
20.description: Increases Expulsion Zone radius and provides Energy
20.longDescription: Increases Expulsion Zone's radius by 15% and Zarya's maximum Energy temporarily increases by 15 per enemy Hero hit for 10 seconds.

20.name: Grenadier
20.description: Particle Grenade charges are returned at once
20.longDescription: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

20.name: Unyielding Defender
20.description: Activate to reset Shield cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 10 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 71 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a shield that absorbs 560 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a shield that absorbs 420 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Expulsion Zone
abilities.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

1.name: Swift Sweep
1.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by .
1.longDescription: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

1.name: Increasing Clarity
1.description: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by , up to . After hitting Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to .
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 150.

1.name: Righteous Assault
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

1.name: Searing Light
1.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to of the energy consumed.
1.longDescription: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

4.name: Majestic Span
4.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by .
4.longDescription: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

4.name: Heavy Burden
4.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by for seconds after the stun.
4.longDescription: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after the stun.

4.name: Repeated Offense
4.description: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by , up to . After stunning Heroes, increase this damage bonus to .
4.longDescription: Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

7.name: Glimmer of Hope
7.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by .
7.longDescription: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

7.name: Empathic Link
7.description: Auriel stores of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.
7.longDescription: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

7.name: Energized Cord
7.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to of the damage against Heroes and of the damage against non-Heroes.
7.longDescription: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 50% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

10.name: Resurrect
10.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for seconds. After a second delay, they are brought back to life with of their maximum Health at the location where they died.
10.longDescription: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

10.name: Crystal Aegis
10.description: Put an allied Hero into a Stasis crystal that explodes
10.longDescription: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 270 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

13.name: Blinding Flash
13.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2.25 seconds.

13.name: Converging Force
13.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

13.name: Piercing Lash
13.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by seconds for each Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

13.name: Repelling Strike
13.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back farther.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 35% farther.

16.name: Reservoir of Hope
16.description: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by .
16.longDescription: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

16.name: Will of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

16.name: Wrath of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain Spell Power.
16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

20.name: Light Speed
20.description: Resurrected allies gain increased Movement Speed, decaying over seconds. While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges faster.
20.longDescription: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

20.name: Diamond Resolve
20.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target Armor for seconds, reducing damage taken by .
20.longDescription: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 50 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 50%.

20.name: Angelic Flight
20.description: After seconds, fly to a target location.
20.longDescription: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

20.name: Shield of Hope
20.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for seconds equal to of the amount of Health they are missing.
20.longDescription: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

abilities.name: Bestow Hope
abilities.description: Passive: 50% of the damage you deal to Heroes and 8% dealt to non-Heroes is stored as energy. Bestow an allied Hero with Hope. While they remain near you, damage they deal causes you to gain energy. You can only have Bestow Hope on 1 ally at a time. You can store up to 505 (+4% per level) energy.

abilities.name: Sacred Sweep
abilities.description: Sweep the area with sacred power, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies caught in the center

abilities.name: Ray of Heaven
abilities.description: Consume your stored energy and heal allied Heroes in the area for the amount of energy consumed.

abilities.name: Detainment Strike
abilities.description: Deal 58 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and knock them back. If they collide with terrain, they are also stunned for 1.25 seconds and take an additional 174 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Crystal Aegis
abilities.description: Place an allied Hero in Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 270 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

1.name: Warbreaker
1.longDescription: Quest: Pull Heroes with Groundbreaker. Reward: After pulling 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker deals an additional 150 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes. Reward: After pulling 15 Heroes, reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 3 seconds.

1.name: Unrivaled Strength
1.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range, damage
1.longDescription: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.

1.name: Body Check
1.longDescription: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds.  Damage is increased by 200% of Armor Up's current bonus, and the Slow amount is increased by 30% if Armor Up's bonus is above 25.

4.name: In For the Kill
4.description: Bloodthirst kills reset cooldown, restore Mana
4.longDescription: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

4.name: Thirst for Battle
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

4.name: Indomitable
4.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Intimidation
7.longDescription: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Oppressor
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Brute Force
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Body Check receive 50% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

7.name: Into the Fray
7.longDescription: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

10.name: Warlord's Challenge
10.description: Force nearby Heroes to attack Garrosh
10.longDescription: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

10.name: Decimate
10.description: Damage and Slow nearby enemies
10.longDescription: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

13.name: Defensive Measures
13.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Groundbreaker grants Garrosh a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

13.name: Bloodcraze
13.longDescription: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 10% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Up
13.description: Activate Armor Up to increase bonus
13.longDescription: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.  Double Up's activation has a 40 second cooldown.

16.name: Rough Landing
16.longDescription: Heroes pulled by Groundbreaker are Slowed by 50% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Mortal Combo
16.description: Reduce Wrecking Ball cooldown on pulled targets
16.longDescription: If Wrecking Ball is used on a Hero within 2 seconds of pulling them with Groundbreaker, Wrecking Ball's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

16.name: Earthshaker
16.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near impact
16.longDescription: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.6 seconds.

20.name: Death Wish
20.description: Takedowns reduce Warlord's Challenge cooldown
20.longDescription: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

20.name: Deadly Calm
20.description: Decimate reduces damage dealt
20.longDescription: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 20% less damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titanic Might
20.description: Wrecking Ball throws an additional enemy
20.longDescription: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

20.name: Inner Rage
20.description: Body Check gains an additional charge
20.longDescription: Body Check gains an additional charge, and its cooldown recharges 100% faster while Armor Up's bonus is at or above 25.

abilities.name: Armor Up
abilities.description: Garrosh gains 1 Armor for every 2% of maximum Health missing.

abilities.name: Groundbreaker
abilities.description: Deal 81 damage to enemies in an area. Heroes hit on the outer edge are pulled toward Garrosh.

abilities.name: Bloodthirst
abilities.description: Deal 156 damage to an enemy and heal for 10% of Garrosh's missing Health. Healing is increased by 100% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Wrecking Ball
abilities.description: Throw a nearby enemy Hero, Minion, or Mercenary to the target location, dealing 91 damage to enemies near the impact and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Warlord's Challenge
abilities.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Decimate
abilities.description: Deal 50 damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 30% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Astral Presence
1.description: Increases Mana regen while low Mana
1.longDescription: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 25% Mana.

1.name: Power Hungry
1.description: Regen Globes give Spell Power and more Mana
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

1.name: Force Armor
1.longDescription: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast.  Stores up to 4 charges.

1.name: Aether Walker
1.description: Teleport costs no Mana when out of combat
1.longDescription: If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 5 seconds, Teleport costs no mana and its cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.

4.name: Charged Blast
4.description: Magic Missiles marks enemies for bonus damage
4.longDescription: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Triumvirate
4.description: Reduces Arcane Orb cooldown at max range
4.longDescription: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

4.name: Dominance
4.longDescription: Takedowns restore 20% of Li-Ming's maximum Health.

7.name: Seeker
7.longDescription: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Zei's Vengeance
7.description: Arcane Orb does more damage from afar
7.longDescription: Arcane Orb does up to 25% more damage to enemies based on distance. Additionally, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Calamity
7.longDescription: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

10.name: Disintegrate
10.description: Long range channeled beam
10.longDescription: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

10.name: Wave Of Force
10.description: Damage and knock enemies back
10.longDescription: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Cannoneer
13.longDescription: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Glass Cannon
13.description: Gain Spell Power but lose max Health
13.longDescription: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 15%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

13.name: Illusionist
13.description: Increases Teleport range, damage refreshes cooldown
13.longDescription:
If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown. 
Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

16.name: Fireflies
16.description: Magic Missiles move faster, lower cooldown and Mana cost
16.longDescription: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

16.name: Mirrorball
16.description: Fires 2 extra Magic Missiles and increases Mana cost
16.longDescription: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

16.name: Arcane Orbit
16.longDescription: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, doing up to 25% more damage.

16.name: Diamond Skin
16.longDescription: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 20% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

20.name: Temporal Flux
20.description: Disintegrate slows enemies
20.longDescription: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

20.name: Repulsion
20.description: Increases cast range and knockback distance
20.longDescription: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
20.description: Cycle abilities to gain Spell Power
20.longDescription: Using Abilities grants 5% Spell Power, to a maximum of 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

20.name: Archon: Pure Power
20.description: Use Disintegrate repeatedly, but no other Abilities
20.longDescription: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

abilities.name: Critical Mass
abilities.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of your Abilities.This includes all Basic, Heroic and Activatable Abilities, unless otherwise noted

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Fire an orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 (+3% per level) damage to the first enemy hit. The amount of damage dealt is increased the further it travels, up to 405 (+3% per level) damage.Damage is calculated from the center of the orb to the location where it was cast.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance instantly.

abilities.name: Disintegrate
abilities.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 (+5% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

abilities.name: Wave of Force
abilities.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160(+5% per level) damage.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Psionic Storm returns Mana per target hit
1.longDescription: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20%

1.name: Templar's Will
1.longDescription: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

1.name: Khaydarin Resonance
1.description: Gather Regen Globes to empower Plasma Shield
1.longDescription: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40%.

4.name: Khala's Celerity
4.longDescription: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Khala's Embrace
4.longDescription: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

4.name: Khala's Light
4.description: Plasma Shield grants Armor on expiration
4.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, the target of Plasma Shield gains 15 Armor for 3 seconds, causing them to take 15% less damage.

7.name: Psionic Projection
7.description: Increases the range of Plasma Shield, Psionic Storm
7.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

7.name: Resonation
7.longDescription: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

7.name: Mental Acuity
7.description: Takedowns reduce the Cooldown of Oracle
7.longDescription: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Become an Archon
10.longDescription: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 166 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.  Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

10.name: Force Wall
10.description: Create an unpathable wall
10.longDescription: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.  Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

13.name: Deep Shift
13.longDescription: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

13.name: Adun's Wisdom
13.longDescription: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

13.name: Nullification
13.description: Greatly lower an enemy Hero's damage
13.longDescription: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Phase Disruption
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

16.name: Psionic Echo
16.description: Psionic Storm may be cast a second time
16.longDescription: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

16.name: Focused Beam
16.longDescription: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Archon duration
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Force Wall's range, cooldown enhanced
20.longDescription: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

20.name: Prismatic Link
20.description: Basic Attack hits multiple targets
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

20.name: Shield Battery
20.description: Activate to grant Plasma Shields to all nearby allies
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.

abilities.name: Oracle
abilities.description: Activate to greatly increase Tassadar's vision radius, allow him to see over obstacles, and detect stealthed units. Lasts for 5 seconds.Passive: Tassadar's Basic Attack is a Distortion Beam that slows enemy units by 20%..

abilities.name: Plasma Shield
abilities.description: Grant a Shield that absorbs 475 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. Heroes gain 40% Life Steal from Basic Attacks while Shielded.

abilities.name: Psionic Storm
abilities.description: Deal 84 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds. Damage increases by 10% for each consecutive instance of damage.

abilities.name: Dimensional Shift
abilities.description: Tassadar becomes invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Archon
abilities.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 166 (+4% per level) damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 83 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 10 seconds.Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

abilities.name: Force Wall
abilities.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2 seconds.Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

1.name: Blossom Swell
1.longDescription: Increases Noxious Blossom's radius by 20%.

1.name: Photosynthesis
1.longDescription: Crippling Spores returns 10 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

1.name: Natural Perspective
1.longDescription: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

1.name: Cruel Spores
1.description: Reduces Crippling Spores cooldown and Mana on Minions and Mercs
1.longDescription: When Crippling Spores hits only Minions or Mercenaries, its cooldown is reduced by 80% and 20 Mana is restored.

4.name: Nimble Wisp
4.description: Increases Wisp Move Speed and vision
4.longDescription: Increases Wisp Movement Speed by 100% and vision radius by 50%.

4.name: Timelost Wisp
4.description: Wisp costs no Mana and reduces cooldown
4.longDescription: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 125% faster while no Wisp is active.

4.name: Skybound Wisp
4.description: Wisp sees over obstacles and reveals area on death
4.longDescription: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

4.name: Dividing Wisp
4.description: Relocating a Wisp creates a copy
4.longDescription: The first time a Wisp is relocated, it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location.

7.name: Siphoning Toxin
7.longDescription: As long as Nature's Toxin is active on an enemy, heal 18 (+4% per level) Health a second.

7.name: Wild Vigor
7.description: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack damage
7.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

7.name: Splintered Spear
7.description: Noxious Blossom causes Basic Attack to hit 4 targets
7.longDescription: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.name: Nature's Culling
7.description: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to non-Heroes
7.longDescription: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 150% to non-Heroes.

10.name: Thornwood Vine
10.description: Damages in a line
10.longDescription: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Leaping Strike
10.description: Damages and leaps over an enemy
10.longDescription: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Pestering Blossom
13.longDescription: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 50%.

13.name: Unfair Advantage
13.description: Increases Nature's Toxin damage to slowed Heroes
13.longDescription: Nature's Toxin deals 50% more damage to Heroes that are slowed.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes
13.longDescription: Empowers your Basic Attacks against Heroes

13.name: Greater Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Choking Pollen
16.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage to enemies with Nature's Toxin
16.longDescription: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 125% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

16.name: Star Wood Spear
16.description: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack range
16.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

16.name: Invigorating Spores
16.description: Crippling Spores increases Basic Attack Speed
16.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Attack Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Let Them Wither
16.longDescription: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 50% and causes it to no longer decay.

20.name: Forest's Wrath
20.description: Increases Thornwood Vine range and speed
20.longDescription: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: All Leaping Strike charges returned at once, can target allies
20.longDescription: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

20.name: Galloping Gait
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed
20.longDescription: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.  Galloping Gait's activation has a 30 second cooldown.

20.name: Abolish Magic
20.description: Remove negative status effects from Lunara and the target
20.longDescription: Target an Ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

abilities.name: Nature's Toxin
abilities.description: Passive: Your Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 34 (+4% per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.Damage is dealt 1 tick per second.

abilities.name: Noxious Blossom
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Crippling Spores
abilities.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.Only activatable, if there is an enemy afflicted by Nature's Toxin.Has global range.

abilities.name: Wisp
abilities.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. Lasts 45 seconds.Wisp requires two instances of damage to be killed.You can only have one Wisp at a time.Cooldown starts when the ablility is first cast.

abilities.name: Relocate Wisp
abilities.description: Orders your Wisp to move to a new location.Replaces Wisp while your Wisp is alive.

abilities.name: Thornwood Vine
abilities.description: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

abilities.name: Leaping Strike
abilities.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 271 (+4% per level) damage. Has 2 charges.Lunara is Unstoppable during the ability.

abilities.name: Dryad's Swiftness
abilities.description: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.Lunara cannot mount.

1.name: Live and Let Live
1.description: High Health reduces Gift of Life cooldown
1.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

1.name: Circle of Life
1.longDescription: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health. Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.name: Flames of Fury
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet. Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Surge of Vitality
4.longDescription: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Heat Exhaustion
4.longDescription: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

4.name: Exuberance
4.longDescription: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Lifeblossom
7.description: Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at high Health
7.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

7.name: Verdant Flourish
7.description: Regen Globe and Abundance healing increased
7.longDescription: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.name: Fire Within
7.longDescription: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.name: Life-Binder
10.description: Link Alexstrasza's Health with an ally
10.longDescription: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. After 2 seconds, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.name: Cleansing Flame
10.description: Rain healing and damaging fire from the sky
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 5.938 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.name: Dragon Scales
13.longDescription: Gain 30 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Pacify
13.description: Slow an enemy Hero and reduce their damage
13.longDescription: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.name: Life Unbound
13.description: Heal an ally and damage enemies
13.longDescription:
Activate to heal an allied Hero for 14.84% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds. 
Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.name: Tough Love
16.description: Gift of Life grants Armor at high Health
16.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

16.name: Overprotective
16.longDescription: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

16.name: Draconic Discipline
16.longDescription: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 9 seconds.

20.name: Ritual of Life
20.description: Life-Binder activates multiple times
20.longDescription: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.

20.name: On Ruby Wings
20.description: Cleansing Flame can activate Dragonqueen
20.longDescription: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

20.name: Ancient Flame
20.description: Dragonqueen Attacks apply Flame Buffet
20.longDescription: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet, but her Attack Speed is reduced by 24.699%.

20.name: Blessing of the Red
20.description: Grant bonus Health to an ally
20.longDescription: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

abilities.name: Dragonqueen
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health. While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Abilities are empowered, her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her, and the duration of incoming Slows, Roots, Blinds, and Stuns is reduced by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds.

abilities.name: Gift of Life
abilities.description: Sacrifice 15% of Alexstrasza's current Health, healing an ally for 150% of that amount.Dragonqueen: Breath of LifeCooldown greatly reduced and does not cost Health.

abilities.name: Breath of Life
abilities.description: Heal an Ally for 20% of Alexstrasza's current Health.

abilities.name: Abundance
abilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 20% of their maximum Health.Dragonqueen: PreservationHeal area and amount greatly increased.

abilities.name: Preservation
abilities.description: Plant a seed of healing that blooms after 3 seconds, healing nearby allied Heroes for 30% of their maximum Health.

abilities.name: Flame Buffet
abilities.description: Launch a fireball, Burning enemies hit for 75 damage over 5.5 seconds.Hitting enemies that are already Burning deals 125 bonus damage upon impact, Slows them by 40% decaying over 2 seconds, and refunds the Mana cost.Dragonqueen: Wing BuffetDamage and Knockback enemies in an arc.

abilities.name: Wing Buffet
abilities.description: Deal 162 damage to enemies in an area, knocking them back and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Life-Binder
abilities.description: Bind Alexstrasa's life force with an allied Hero. After 2 seconds, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is set to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.Life-Binder is "interrupted" if either of the two linked Heroes dies, becomes Time Stopped, enters a vehicle, or otherwise "leaves" the battlefield. When this happens it goes on a 10 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Cleansing Flame
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop fireballs at the position of your mouse cursor every 1.2 seconds for 6 seconds. Each fireball restores 300 Health to nearby allied Heroes, and deals 150 damage to nearby enemies.2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of your mouse cursor.

1.name: Put Some English On It
1.longDescription: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.longDescription: Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Bouncy Bouncy
1.description: Frag Launcher grenades gain damage after ricochet
1.longDescription: Upon colliding with terrain for the first time, Frag Launcher grenades deal 20% more damage.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.5, up to 100.

4.name: Bonzer Hits
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

4.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

7.name: Tricky Shuffles
7.description: Gain Move Speed while Frag Launcher replenishing
7.longDescription: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Big As
7.longDescription: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Steel Trap Slows, no longer Roots
7.longDescription: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90% for 3.5 seconds.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb that explodes
10.longDescription: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475 (+4% per level), 625 (+4% per level), or 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: Launch into the air, damaging enemies upon landing
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.longDescription: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Bogged Down
13.longDescription: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

13.name: Chattering Teeth
13.longDescription: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.longDescription: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting Heroes reduces Frag Launcher cooldown
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher spread
16.longDescription: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire knockback, reduce cooldown
20.longDescription: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Reduce Rocket Ride cooldown
20.longDescription: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 70 seconds.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Bigger Basic Attack, Frag Launcher explosions
20.longDescription: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by -98.5%.

20.name: BOOM POW
20.description: Hitting Heroes reduces Concussion Mine cooldown
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 damage to nearby enemies. Does 75% less damage to Structures.Basic Attacks deal 100% splash damage.Detonate MineDetonate an active Concussion Mine

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 128 damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures. Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.There is 0.5 seconds cooldown inbetween charges.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.Limit 1 active mine.The mine is invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until detonation or placing another one.This ability knocks the targets hit into the air, making them fly over terrain.Distance of the knockback depends of how far is the target hit from the center of the ability's Area of Effect, with the longest being the farthest.The duration of the knockback is 1 second, regardless of distance from the center.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.Limit 1 active trap.The trap is invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until triggering or placing another one.

abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Create a motorized bomb with with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire Can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 475, 625, or 775 damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).RIP-Tire does not detonate if destroyed or expired.If Junkrat's channel gets interrupted, RIP-Tire instantly expires without detonating.Crowd control effects affect RIP-Tire only for a brief duration.

abilities.name: Rocket Ride
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving. After 3.5 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 750 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

abilities.name: Jump
abilities.description: Activate to make RIP-Tire jump. Can be used to pass over terrain and Structures.This ability is available while controlling RIP-Tire.

1.name: Enduring Swarm
1.longDescription: Dark Swarm grants 40 Spell Armor while active.

1.name: Tissue Regeneration
1.description: Essence increases Health Regen, max Essence
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

1.name: Enhanced Agility
1.longDescription: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush. Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

4.name: Lurker Strain
4.longDescription: Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

4.name: One-Who-Collects
4.longDescription: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

4.name: Hero Stalker
4.longDescription: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%.

7.name: Feeding Frenzy
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Constriction
7.longDescription: Increases Drag duration by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Symbiosis
7.description: Reduces Dark Swarm cooldown against Heroes
7.longDescription: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

10.name: Isolation
10.description: Silence, Slow, and reduce vision of an enemy
10.longDescription: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

10.name: Adaptation
10.description: Heal back damage taken
10.longDescription: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

13.name: Primal Rage
13.longDescription: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

13.name: Ferocious Stalker
13.longDescription: Dark Swarm deals 40% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

13.name: Primal Swarm
13.longDescription: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

16.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
16.longDescription: Drag slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds after it ends.

16.name: Elongated Tongue
16.longDescription: Increase Drag range by 20%.

16.name: Tunneling Claws
16.longDescription: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

20.name: Contagion
20.description: Isolation splashes to nearby Heroes
20.longDescription: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

20.name: Change Is Survival
20.description: Enhanced Adaptation healing, cooldown
20.longDescription: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apex Predator
20.description: Reduced Brushstalker cooldown, cast time
20.longDescription: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 25 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Essence Claws
20.description: Basic Attacks slow, grant Essence
20.longDescription: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

abilities.name: Essence Collection
abilities.description: Gain 10 Essence from Takedowns and 2 Essence from nearby Minions dying. Activate to consume all Essence and heal yourself for 29 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds for each Essence stored. Maximum of 50 Essence. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Lash out with your tongue, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with you for 1.75 seconds. If you are stunned or silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 47 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Isolation
abilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, silencing and slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Adaptation
abilities.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

abilities.name: Brushstalker
abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the battleground.Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.

1.name: Free Drinks
1.description: Healing Brew cost reduced on low Health targets
1.longDescription: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

1.name: Wind Serpent
1.description: Blinding Wind reduces Cloud Serpent cooldown
1.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Blinding Wind reduces the cooldown of Cloud Serpent by 3 seconds.

1.name: Eager Adventurer
1.longDescription: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 50% and increase Mana regeneration by 150% while Fast Feet is active.

4.name: Serpent Sidekick
4.description: Hitting Heroes increases Cloud Serpent duration
4.longDescription: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds every time it attacks an Hero.

4.name: Hindering Winds
4.longDescription: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Safety Sprint
4.description: Activate Fast Feet for a burst of speed
4.longDescription: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 2 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew also heals over time
7.longDescription: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Lightning Serpent
7.description: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to Heroes
7.longDescription: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 50% (+4% per level) damage and healing.

7.name: Let's Go!
7.description: Activate to heal ally, make them Unstoppable
7.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Rapidly heal nearby allies
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66.5 (+4% per level) Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Damages and heavily slows nearest enemy Hero
10.longDescription: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 318 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Gale Force
13.longDescription: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 1 second. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 50% increased damage.

13.name: Surging Winds
13.description: Gain Spell Power from Blinding Wind
13.longDescription: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

13.name: Mass Vortex
13.longDescription: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Healing Brew heals twice but longer cooldown
16.longDescription: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew heals more on low Health targets
16.longDescription: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% (+4% per level) if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings Of Yu'lon
16.longDescription: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for 1.5% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 cups heals two allies at once
20.longDescription: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: Summons two dragons
20.longDescription: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Activate to heal nearby Heroes
20.longDescription: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 165 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Shake It Off
20.description: Fast Feet grants Armor
20.longDescription: Gain 0 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

abilities.name: Fast Feet
abilities.description: Upon taking damage, gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

abilities.name: Healing Brew
abilities.description: Heal lowest Health ally (prioritizing Heroes) for 204 (+ 4% per level) Health.

abilities.name: Cloud Serpent
abilities.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on target allied Hero that automatically attacks nearby enemies, doing 25 (+ 4% per level) damage per attack. Heroes can only have 1 Cloud Serpent at a time. Lasts for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Blinding Wind
abilities.description: Throw a cloud of Blinding Wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 140 (+ 4% per level) damage. Affected targets miss all Basic Attacks for the next 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
abilities.description: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing Heroes, restoring a total of 1698 (+ 4% per level) Health over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Water Dragon
abilities.description: Summon a Water Dragon that after a delay hits the nearest enemy Hero and all enemies near them, dealing 318 (+ 4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

1.name: Greater Cleave
1.longDescription: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

1.name: Vorpal Blade
1.longDescription: Activate to teleport to Zeratul's last non-structure Basic Attack target within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

1.name: Shadow Hunter
1.description: Gather Regen Globes to empower Blink
1.longDescription: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 2. Reward: Upon gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

4.name: Grim Task
4.description: Hero Takedowns increase Spell Power by , up to . This bonus Spell Power is lost on death.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Spell Power by 5%, up to 50% . This bonus Spell Power is lost on death.

4.name: Rending Cleave
4.description: Cleave deals additional damage over time
4.longDescription: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Combo Slash
4.longDescription: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.name: Wormhole
7.longDescription: For 2 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

7.name: Slip into Shadow
7.description: Blink has 2 charges, but higher cooldown
7.longDescription: Blink gains an additional charge, but its cooldown is increased by 8 seconds.

7.name: Seeker in the Dark
7.longDescription: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Assault
10.description: Basic Attacks teleport to enemies
10.longDescription: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Void Prison
10.description: Time Stop targets in an area
10.longDescription: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

13.name: Shroud of Adun
13.description: Gain a shield while under Permanent Cloak
13.longDescription: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.longDescription: Periodically gain temporary Spell Armor

13.name: Mending Strikes
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Master Warp-Blade
16.description: Bonus damage every third Basic Attack
16.longDescription: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

16.name: Void Slash
16.longDescription: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Sentenced to Death
16.description: Deal bonus damage to marked targets
16.longDescription: Deal 40% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

20.name: Nerazim Fury
20.description: Grants Life Steal and increased duration
20.longDescription: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Gift of the Xel'Naga
20.description: Allies unaffected by Void Prison, enemies slowed
20.longDescription: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal more damage and Slow

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset cooldowns
20.longDescription: Activate to reset cooldowns

abilities.name: Permanent Cloak
abilities.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling ends Permenent Cloak.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Deal 415 (197 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 500 (238 + 4% per level) damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break cloak.

abilities.name: Shadow Assault
abilities.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Void Prison
abilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

1.name: Accumulating Flame
1.description: Ignite Heroes to empower Breath of Fire
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 25 Armor for 1 second per Hero Ignited, reducing damage taken by 25%.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Elusive Brawler
1.longDescription: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Increase Flying Kick damage and remove Brew cost
4.longDescription: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Keg Toss
4.description: Hit Heroes to empower Keg Smash
4.longDescription: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

4.name: Ring of Fire
4.description: Damage nearby enemies after using Breath of Fire
4.longDescription: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: Gain bonuses based on current level of Brew
7.longDescription: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Bolder Flavor
7.description: Fortifying Brew grants a large Shield immediately
7.longDescription: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 318 (+4% per level). Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

7.name: Purifying Brew
7.longDescription: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds. While channeling Fortifying Brew gain 30 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around in the barrel and knock away enemies
10.longDescription: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: Split into three elemental spirits
10.longDescription:
After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies.
Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.longDescription: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.longDescription: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

13.name: Withering Flames
13.description: Setting Heroes on fire reduces their Spell Power
13.longDescription: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Flying Leap
16.longDescription: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15%.

16.name: Another Round
16.description: Keg Smash lowers cooldowns, has increased radius
16.longDescription: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Enough to Share
16.longDescription: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 54 (+4% per level) per second.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Increases Wandering Keg Speed, Armor
20.longDescription: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increase spirit Health and empower their abilities
20.longDescription:
Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.  Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

20.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
20.description: Basic Abilities heal Chen
20.longDescription: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

abilities.name: Fortifying Brew
abilities.description: Chen drinks from his keg, instantly gaining 25 Brew. While drinking, Chen continues to gain 30 Brew and 212 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 636 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 2 seconds after you stop drinking.

abilities.name: Flying Kick
abilities.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Keg Smash
abilities.description: Smash your keg, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage and drenching affected enemies in Brew, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Breath of Fire
abilities.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies soaked in Brew are set on fire, dealing 96 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
abilities.description: Split into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of your maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well. Storm can grant your spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant your spirits Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Wandering Keg
abilities.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

1.name: Swift as the Wind
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Agile Dismount
1.description: Increase Cyber Agility range while Mounted
1.longDescription: While mounted, the range of Cyber Agility is increased by 70% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

1.name: Pathfinder
1.description: Jumping over terrain increases Move Speed
1.longDescription: Jumping over terrain with Cyber Agility increases Genji's Movement Speed by 25% for 6 seconds.

4.name: Shuriken Mastery
4.description: Increase Shuriken damage and restore charges
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes with Shuriken. Reward: After hitting 35 Heroes, Shuriken damage is increased by 25. Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes, Cyber Agility now refunds 2 charges of Shuriken.

4.name: Strike At The Heart
4.description: Extra Swift Strike damage at its end
4.longDescription: Enemies hit by the end of Swift Strike take an additional 138 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds.

4.name: Dragon Claw
4.longDescription: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

7.name: Augmented Guard
7.description: Gain a Shield after Deflect ends
7.longDescription: When Deflect ends, Genji gains a Shield equal to 50% of the damage blocked for 4 seconds.

7.name: Perfect Defense
7.longDescription: Deflected damage reduces the cooldown of Deflect by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 10 seconds.

7.name: Cyber Shield
7.longDescription: Using Cyber Agility grants 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Dodge
7.longDescription: Genji dodges 1 Heroic Basic Attack every 8 seconds.

10.name: Dragonblade
10.description: Unleash the Dragonblade
10.longDescription: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.

10.name: X-Strike
10.description: Deal heavy damage in a cross shape
10.longDescription: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.

13.name: Shingan
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with all 3 Shuriken deals 115 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

13.name: Flow Like Water
13.description: Hitting Heroes reduces Swift Strike cooldown
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Swift Strike reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Jump
13.description: Cyber Agility gains a second charge
13.longDescription: Cyber Agility stores 2 charges but its cooldown is increased by 5 seconds.

16.name: Reflect
16.longDescription: Deflect also deals an additional 33% of the damage blocked.

16.name: Final Cut
16.description: Swift Strike deals extra damage after a delay
16.longDescription: After 1 second, Swift Strike deals an additional 125 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in the area.

16.name: Steady Blade
16.description: Swift Strike deals increased damage for each Hero hit
16.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Swift Strike increases the damage of the next Swift Strike by 20%. This bonus stacks up to 3 times.

20.name: The Dragon Becomes Me
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes increases duration
20.longDescription: Each time Dragonblade hits an enemy Hero, the duration of Dragonblade is increased by .75 second.

20.name: Living Weapon
20.description: Hero hits reduce X-Strike's cooldown
20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

20.name: Sharpened Stars
20.description: Shuriken pierce
20.longDescription: Shuriken now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: Zanshin
20.description: Deflect hits all nearby Heroes
20.longDescription: Quest: Block 6500 damage with Deflect, including damage blocked so far. Reward: Deflect hits all nearby enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Cyber Agility
abilities.description: Activate to jump to target area.Can go over walls and terrain.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.Stores up to 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.There is 0.5 second cooldown inbetween charges.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.Damage over time effects and Abilities that deal periodic damage proc Deflect on every tick of damage.If the channel gets interrupted by a Stun or a Silence, the damage of the Ability that caused the interruption still gets deflected.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 2 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.Can go over walls and terrain.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage. If enemy Heroes are killed within 2 seconds of being hit by Dragonblade, Swift Strike's cooldown is reset.Dragonblade replaces Shuriken for its duration and can be reactivated with both Q and R keysGetting Silenced or Rooted makes you inable to reactivate Dragonblade.

abilities.name: X-Strike
abilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.Slashes are aligned 45 degrees to both sides from the direction Genji is facing, first slash hitting towards his right hand side. Genji turns before ability is cast.For the duration of the slash animation, Genji is removed from the battlefield, making him Untargetable and immune to damage.Removes Roots, Slows, Blinds and Armor debuffs on cast, but not Damage over Time effects or hero-specific debuffs like Jaina's 'Chill'Self-casting the ability makes Genji move forward a bit.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases Spike Burst range and decreases cooldown
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.longDescription: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

1.name: Regenerative Microbes
